trans-unit.source: <see cref="T:System.Windows.UIElement3D" /> is a base class for WPF core level implementations building on Windows Presentation Foundation (WPF) elements and basic presentation characteristics.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.UIElement3D" /> 是以 Windows Presentation Foundation (WPF) 項目和基本呈現方式特性為建置基礎之 WPF 核心層級實作的基底類別。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.UIElement3D> is an abstract base class from which you can derive classes to represent specific 3D elements.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.UIElement3D> 是抽象的基底類別，您可以從中衍生類別來代表特定的 3D 項目。

trans-unit.source: Much of the input, focusing, and eventing behavior for 3D elements in general is defined in the <xref:System.Windows.UIElement3D> class.
trans-unit.target: 3D 項目的輸入、 焦點，以及事件處理行為的許多一般定義於<xref:System.Windows.UIElement3D>類別。

trans-unit.source: This includes the events for keyboard, mouse, and stylus input, and related status properties.
trans-unit.target: 這包括鍵盤、 滑鼠及手寫筆輸入及相關的狀態屬性的事件。

trans-unit.source: Many of these events are routed events, and many of the input-related events have both a bubbling routing version as well as a tunneling version of the event.
trans-unit.target: 其中許多事件會路由的事件，以及許多輸入相關的事件都有兩個反昇路由版本，以及通道事件的版本。

trans-unit.source: These paired events are typically the events of greatest interest to control authors.
trans-unit.target: 這些配對的事件通常是最大控制項作者感興趣的事件。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.UIElement3D> also includes [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_api#plural](~/includes/tlasharptla-apisharpplural-md.md)] that relate to the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] event model, including methods that can raise specified routed events that are sourced from an element instance.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.UIElement3D> 也包含[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_api#plural](~/includes/tlasharptla-apisharpplural-md.md)]相關的[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)]事件模型，包括可以引發的方法所指定路由傳送來自於項目執行個體的事件。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Windows.UIElement3D> has the following capabilities that are specifically defined by the <xref:System.Windows.UIElement3D> class:
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.Windows.UIElement3D>具有下列功能，特別由定義<xref:System.Windows.UIElement3D>類別：

trans-unit.source: Can respond to user input (including control of where input is sent via handling of event routing or routing of commands).
trans-unit.target: 可以回應使用者輸入 (包括控制項的輸入透過事件處理的傳送位置路由或路由的命令)。

trans-unit.source: Can raise routed events that travel a route through the logical element tree.
trans-unit.target: 可以引發邏輯項目樹狀透過路由的路由的事件。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.UIElement3D.Visibility%2A> state affects all input handling by that element.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.UIElement3D.Visibility%2A> 狀態會影響所有的項目所處理的輸入。

trans-unit.source: Elements that are not visible do not participate in hit testing and do not receive input events, even if the mouse is over the bounds of where the element would be if were visible.
trans-unit.target: 不會顯示的項目不會參與點擊測試，而不會收到輸入的事件，即使透過範圍將項目，則滑鼠如果可以看見。

trans-unit.source: Unlike the <xref:System.Windows.UIElement> class, the <xref:System.Windows.UIElement3D> class does not include layout.
trans-unit.target: 不同於<xref:System.Windows.UIElement>類別<xref:System.Windows.UIElement3D>類別不包含配置。

trans-unit.source: Therefore, the <xref:System.Windows.UIElement3D> class does not include **Measure** or **Arrange** methods.
trans-unit.target: 因此，<xref:System.Windows.UIElement3D>類別不包含**量值**或**排列**方法。

trans-unit.source: A class that derives from <xref:System.Windows.UIElement3D> and maintains its own collection of <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Visual3D> objects by overriding <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Visual3D.GetVisual3DChild%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Visual3D.Visual3DChildrenCount%2A> must still pass new <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Visual3D> objects to <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Visual3D.AddVisual3DChild%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 類別衍生自<xref:System.Windows.UIElement3D>並維護它自己的集合<xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Visual3D>藉由覆寫物件<xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Visual3D.GetVisual3DChild%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Visual3D.Visual3DChildrenCount%2A>仍然必須傳遞新<xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Visual3D>物件加入至<xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Visual3D.AddVisual3DChild%2A>。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.UIElement3D> is introduced in the .NET Framework version 3.5.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.UIElement3D> .NET Framework 3.5 版中引進。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Versions and Dependencies](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[版本和相依性](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md)。

trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Windows.UIElement3D" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.UIElement3D.%23ctor%2A> .NET Framework 3.5 版中引進。

trans-unit.source: Adds a routed event handler for a specified routed event, adding the handler to the handler collection on the current element.
trans-unit.target: 加入所指定路由事件的路由事件處理常式，會將此處理常式加入目前項目的處理常式集合中。

trans-unit.source: An identifier for the routed event to be handled.
trans-unit.target: 要處理的路由事件識別項。

trans-unit.source: A reference to the handler implementation.
trans-unit.target: 處理常式實作的參考。

trans-unit.source: Adds a routed event handler for a specified routed event, adding the handler to the handler collection on the current element.
trans-unit.target: 加入所指定路由事件的路由事件處理常式，會將此處理常式加入目前項目的處理常式集合中。

trans-unit.source: You can add the same handler for the same event multiple times without raising an exception.
trans-unit.target: 您可以加入相同的處理常式事件多次，而不會引發例外狀況。

trans-unit.source: However, the handler is actually invoked multiple times when the event is handled.
trans-unit.target: 不過，此處理常式實際叫用時處理事件的多次。

trans-unit.source: Therefore, consider how this behavior might have side effects that should be accounted for in your handler implementation.
trans-unit.target: 因此，請考慮如何這種行為可能會有副作用，都應該在處理常式實作。

trans-unit.source: You typically use this method to provide the implementation of the "add" accessor for the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_net](~/includes/tlasharptla-net-md.md)] event access pattern of a custom routed event.
trans-unit.target: 您通常使用這個方法來提供的 「 加入 」 存取子的實作[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_net](~/includes/tlasharptla-net-md.md)]事件的自訂路由事件的存取模式。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.UIElement3D.AddHandler%2A> is introduced in the .NET Framework version 3.5.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.UIElement3D.AddHandler%2A> .NET Framework 3.5 版中引進。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Versions and Dependencies](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[版本和相依性](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md)。

trans-unit.source: An identifier for the routed event to be handled.
trans-unit.target: 要處理的路由事件識別項。

trans-unit.source: A reference to the handler implementation.
trans-unit.target: 處理常式實作的參考。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to register the handler such that it is invoked even when the routed event is marked handled in its event data; <see langword="false" /> to register the handler with the default condition that it will not be invoked if the routed event is already marked handled.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> 表示註冊處理常式，以便即使路由事件在其事件資料中標記為已處理，仍會叫用該處理常式。<see langword="false" /> 表示以預設條件註冊處理常式，也就是如果路由事件已經標記為已處理，則不會叫用該處理常式。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 預設值為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Do not routinely ask to rehandle a routed event.
trans-unit.target: 請勿定期要求重新處理路由事件。

trans-unit.source: Adds a routed event handler for a specified routed event, adding the handler to the handler collection on the current element.
trans-unit.target: 加入所指定路由事件的路由事件處理常式，會將此處理常式加入目前項目的處理常式集合中。

trans-unit.source: Specify <paramref name="handledEventsToo" /> as <see langword="true" /> to have the provided handler be invoked for routed event that had already been marked as handled by another element along the event route.
trans-unit.target: 將 <paramref name="handledEventsToo" /> 指定為 <see langword="true" />，以針對已經由事件路由上另一個項目標記為已處理的路由事件，叫用提供的處理常式。

trans-unit.source: Processing low-level input events in a practical way is a complex task.
trans-unit.target: 在可行的方式處理低階輸入是一個複雜的工作。

trans-unit.source: Many controls implement behavior where a certain event is marked as handled, and is replaced by another more intuitive event.
trans-unit.target: 許多控制項實作特定事件標示為已處理，而取代為另一個更具直覺性事件的行為。

trans-unit.source: Generally, a control will only mark a platform input event as handled if there is some design intention for doing so.
trans-unit.target: 一般而言，控制項只會將平台輸入的事件，為已處理，如果沒有這麼做一些設計用意。

trans-unit.source: In certain scenarios, those design intentions might not be what your particular handling of the input event requires.
trans-unit.target: 在某些情況下，這些設計目的不可能的輸入事件的特定處理的需要。

trans-unit.source: It is for these scenarios that registering handlers with `handledEventsToo` as `true` is appropriate.
trans-unit.target: 這些案例是該註冊處理常式取代`handledEventsToo`為`true`適合。

trans-unit.source: But you should not do this routinely.
trans-unit.target: 但您不應該這麼例行性。

trans-unit.source: Invoking handlers in response to all events even if handled will complicate your own application event processing logic.
trans-unit.target: 叫用處理常式以回應所有事件，即使處理將會使得您自己的應用程式事件處理邏輯。

trans-unit.source: You may see a decrease in performance if the handler logic is substantial.
trans-unit.target: 如果處理常式邏輯的很大，可能會看到效能降低。

trans-unit.source: You should reserve the use of attaching handlers for already-handled events for situations where you have already discovered during the development process that certain controls are handling events that you still want to handle with application logic.
trans-unit.target: 您應該保留附加尚未處理的情況下，您已經發現特定控制項所處理的事件，您仍然想要處理的應用程式邏輯在開發程序的事件處理常式的使用。

trans-unit.source: Another technique for avoiding the class handling behavior of certain event-control combinations is to use that event's preview alternative.
trans-unit.target: 避免處理行為的某些事件控制組合類別的另一個技術是使用該事件預覽替代方案。

trans-unit.source: For example, if <xref:System.Windows.UIElement3D.MouseLeftButtonDown> is marked handled by class handling, you might be able to add handlers for <xref:System.Windows.UIElement3D.PreviewMouseLeftButtonDown> instead.
trans-unit.target: 例如，如果<xref:System.Windows.UIElement3D.MouseLeftButtonDown>標示為已處理的類別處理，您可以加入處理常式<xref:System.Windows.UIElement3D.PreviewMouseLeftButtonDown>改為。

trans-unit.source: You can add the same handler for the same event multiple times without raising an exception.
trans-unit.target: 您可以加入相同的處理常式事件多次，而不會引發例外狀況。

trans-unit.source: However, the handler is actually invoked multiple times when the event is handled.
trans-unit.target: 不過，此處理常式實際叫用時處理事件的多次。

trans-unit.source: Therefore, consider how this behavior might have side effects that should be accounted for in your handler implementation.
trans-unit.target: 因此，請考慮如何這種行為可能會有副作用，都應該在處理常式實作。

trans-unit.source: You typically use this method to provide the implementation of the "add" accessor for the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_net](~/includes/tlasharptla-net-md.md)] event access pattern of a custom routed event.
trans-unit.target: 您通常使用這個方法來提供的 「 加入 」 存取子的實作[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_net](~/includes/tlasharptla-net-md.md)]事件的自訂路由事件的存取模式。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.UIElement3D.AddHandler%2A> is introduced in the .NET Framework version 3.5.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.UIElement3D.AddHandler%2A> .NET Framework 3.5 版中引進。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Versions and Dependencies](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[版本和相依性](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md)。

trans-unit.source: The event route that handlers are added to.
trans-unit.target: 加入處理常式的事件路由。

trans-unit.source: The event data that is used to add the handlers.
trans-unit.target: 用於加入處理常式的事件資料。

trans-unit.source: This method uses the <see cref="P:System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs.RoutedEvent" /> property of the event data to create the handlers.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會使用事件資料的 <see cref="P:System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs.RoutedEvent" /> 屬性來建立處理常式。

trans-unit.source: Adds handlers to the specified <see cref="T:System.Windows.EventRoute" /> for the current <see cref="T:System.Windows.UIElement3D" /> event handler collection.
trans-unit.target: 針對目前的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.EventRoute" /> 事件處理常式集合，將處理常式加入至指定的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.UIElement3D" />。

trans-unit.source: This method can be used by content host elements (either those that implement <xref:System.Windows.IContentHost> or those that don't) to add handlers for child elements to the <xref:System.Windows.EventRoute>.
trans-unit.target: 內容主機項目可以使用這個方法 (可能是指實作<xref:System.Windows.IContentHost>或未) 若要加入的子項目，來處理常式<xref:System.Windows.EventRoute>。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.UIElement3D.AddToEventRoute%2A> is introduced in the .NET Framework version 3.5.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.UIElement3D.AddToEventRoute%2A> .NET Framework 3.5 版中引進。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Versions and Dependencies](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[版本和相依性](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md)。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether this element can be used as the target of a drag-and-drop operation.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定此元素是否可以當做拖放操作目標的值。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if this element can be used as the target of a drag-and-drop operation; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果這個項目可以用來做為拖放作業的目標則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The default value is <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 預設值是 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Drag-and-drop operations are not enabled by default, and must be enabled deliberately by setting <xref:System.Windows.UIElement3D.AllowDrop%2A> to `true`.
trans-unit.target: 拖放作業依預設，未啟用，且必須藉由設定刻意啟用<xref:System.Windows.UIElement3D.AllowDrop%2A>至`true`。

trans-unit.source: Beyond this basic setting, drag-and-drop behavior is entirely implementation specific and is not defined by <xref:System.Windows.UIElement3D> or any other base element class.
trans-unit.target: 超出此基本設定，拖放行為完全實作特定，不由定義<xref:System.Windows.UIElement3D>或其他類型的基底項目類別。

trans-unit.source: Certain controls, for example, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.RichTextBox>, do have a default behavior.
trans-unit.target: 某些控制項，例如<xref:System.Windows.Controls.RichTextBox>，沒有預設行為。

trans-unit.source: For more information on drag and drop, see [Drag and Drop Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/drag-and-drop-overview.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需拖放的詳細資訊，請參閱[拖曳和卸除概觀](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/drag-and-drop-overview.md)。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.UIElement3D.AllowDrop%2A> is introduced in the .NET Framework version 3.5.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.UIElement3D.AllowDrop%2A> .NET Framework 3.5 版中引進。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Versions and Dependencies](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[版本和相依性](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md)。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether at least one touch is captured to this element.
trans-unit.target: 取得值，這個值表示是否至少有一個觸控擷取至這個項目。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if at least one touch is captured to this element; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果至少有一個觸控擷取至這個項目，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <see cref="P:System.Windows.UIElement3D.AreAnyTouchesCaptured" /> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: 識別 <see cref="P:System.Windows.UIElement3D.AreAnyTouchesCaptured" /> 相依性屬性。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether at least one touch is captured to this element or to any child elements in its visual tree.
trans-unit.target: 取得值，這個值表示是否至少有一個觸控擷取至這個項目或其視覺化樹狀結構中的任何子項目。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if at least one touch is captured to this element or any child elements in its visual tree; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果至少有一個觸控擷取至這個項目或其視覺化樹狀結構中的任何子項目，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <see cref="P:System.Windows.UIElement3D.AreAnyTouchesCapturedWithin" /> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: 識別 <see cref="P:System.Windows.UIElement3D.AreAnyTouchesCapturedWithin" /> 相依性屬性。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether at least one touch is pressed over this element.
trans-unit.target: 取得值，這個值表示是否至少有一個觸控在這個項目上按下。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if at least one touch is pressed over this element; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果至少有一個觸控在這個項目上按下，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <see cref="P:System.Windows.UIElement3D.AreAnyTouchesDirectlyOver" /> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: 識別 <see cref="P:System.Windows.UIElement3D.AreAnyTouchesDirectlyOver" /> 相依性屬性。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether at least one touch is pressed over this element or any child elements in its visual tree.
trans-unit.target: 取得值，這個值表示是否至少有一個觸控在這個項目或其視覺化樹狀結構中的任何子項目上按下。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if at least one touch is pressed over this element or any child elements in its visual tree; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果至少有一個觸控在這個項目或其視覺化樹狀結構中的任何子項目上按下，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <see cref="P:System.Windows.UIElement3D.AreAnyTouchesOver" /> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: 識別 <see cref="P:System.Windows.UIElement3D.AreAnyTouchesOver" /> 相依性屬性。

trans-unit.source: Attempts to force capture of the mouse to this element.
trans-unit.target: 嘗試強制將滑鼠的捕捉給這個項目。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the mouse is successfully captured; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果成功捕捉到滑鼠則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: To be captured, an element must be enabled.
trans-unit.target: 若要擷取項目都必須啟用。

trans-unit.source: Check whether <xref:System.Windows.UIElement3D.IsEnabled%2A> is `true` before you call <xref:System.Windows.UIElement3D.CaptureMouse%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 檢查是否<xref:System.Windows.UIElement3D.IsEnabled%2A>是`true`之前先呼叫<xref:System.Windows.UIElement3D.CaptureMouse%2A>。

trans-unit.source: If calling <xref:System.Windows.UIElement3D.CaptureMouse%2A> returns `true`, then <xref:System.Windows.UIElement3D.IsMouseCaptured%2A> is also `true`.
trans-unit.target: 如果呼叫<xref:System.Windows.UIElement3D.CaptureMouse%2A>傳回`true`，然後<xref:System.Windows.UIElement3D.IsMouseCaptured%2A>也`true`。

trans-unit.source: If calling <xref:System.Windows.UIElement3D.CaptureMouse%2A> returns `true`, then the <xref:System.Windows.UIElement3D.GotMouseCapture> and <xref:System.Windows.UIElement3D.IsMouseCapturedChanged> events are raised, with <xref:System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs.Source%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> in the event data reported as the element where the <xref:System.Windows.UIElement3D.CaptureMouse%2A> method is called.
trans-unit.target: 如果呼叫<xref:System.Windows.UIElement3D.CaptureMouse%2A>傳回`true`，然後在<xref:System.Windows.UIElement3D.GotMouseCapture>和<xref:System.Windows.UIElement3D.IsMouseCapturedChanged>引發事件，與<xref:System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs.Source%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>事件中的項目報告資料其中<xref:System.Windows.UIElement3D.CaptureMouse%2A>方法呼叫。

trans-unit.source: If you force capture, you might interfere with existing captures—especially with captures that relate to drag-and-drop with the mouse.
trans-unit.target: 如果您強制擷取時，您可能會干擾現有的擷取 — 尤其是使用與拖放滑鼠相關聯的擷取。

trans-unit.source: To clear mouse capture from all elements, call <xref:System.Windows.Input.Mouse.Capture%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> with the `element` parameter provided as `null`.
trans-unit.target: 若要清除所有項目從滑鼠擷取，請呼叫<xref:System.Windows.Input.Mouse.Capture%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>與`element`提供做為參數`null`。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.UIElement3D.CaptureMouse%2A> is introduced in the .NET Framework version 3.5.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.UIElement3D.CaptureMouse%2A> .NET Framework 3.5 版中引進。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Versions and Dependencies](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[版本和相依性](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md)。

trans-unit.source: Attempts to force capture of the stylus to this element.
trans-unit.target: 嘗試強制將手寫筆的捕捉給這個項目。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the stylus was successfully captured; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果成功捕捉到手寫筆則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The default implementation based on the underlying default stylus device always returns `true`.
trans-unit.target: 永遠根據基礎的預設手寫筆裝置的預設實作會傳回`true`。

trans-unit.source: However, if you are extending the input devices that provide the device implementation for the input system, it is possible to create a system with an alternative stylus device implementation that might return different results.
trans-unit.target: 不過，如果可延伸提供輸入系統的裝置實作的輸入的裝置，則可以替代手寫筆裝置的實作可能會傳回不同的結果，以建立系統。

trans-unit.source: When an element captures the stylus, it receives stylus input even if the stylus is outside its bounds.
trans-unit.target: 當項目擷取手寫筆時，即使手寫筆在其範圍外接收手寫筆輸入。

trans-unit.source: The stylus is typically captured only during drag-and-drop operations.
trans-unit.target: 通常只會在拖放作業期間擷取手寫筆。

trans-unit.source: Calling this method calls an underlying static <xref:System.Windows.Input.Stylus> method <xref:System.Windows.Input.Stylus.Capture%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 呼叫這個方法會呼叫基礎靜態<xref:System.Windows.Input.Stylus>方法<xref:System.Windows.Input.Stylus.Capture%2A>。

trans-unit.source: The actual capture behavior is implemented by the active stylus device implementation.
trans-unit.target: 實際擷取行為的實作方法的使用中的手寫筆裝置的實作。

trans-unit.source: To be captured, an element must be enabled.
trans-unit.target: 若要擷取項目都必須啟用。

trans-unit.source: Check whether <xref:System.Windows.UIElement3D.IsEnabled%2A> is `true` return before you call <xref:System.Windows.UIElement3D.CaptureStylus%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 檢查是否<xref:System.Windows.UIElement3D.IsEnabled%2A>是`true`傳回才能呼叫<xref:System.Windows.UIElement3D.CaptureStylus%2A>。

trans-unit.source: If calling <xref:System.Windows.UIElement3D.CaptureStylus%2A> returns `true`, <xref:System.Windows.UIElement3D.IsStylusCaptured%2A> is also `true`.
trans-unit.target: 如果呼叫<xref:System.Windows.UIElement3D.CaptureStylus%2A>傳回`true`，<xref:System.Windows.UIElement3D.IsStylusCaptured%2A>也`true`。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.UIElement3D.CaptureStylus%2A> is introduced in the .NET Framework version 3.5.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.UIElement3D.CaptureStylus%2A> .NET Framework 3.5 版中引進。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Versions and Dependencies](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[版本和相依性](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md)。

trans-unit.source: The device to capture.
trans-unit.target: 要擷取的裝置。

trans-unit.source: Attempts to force capture of a touch to this element.
trans-unit.target: 嘗試強制將觸控擷取至這個項目。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the specified touch is captured to this element; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果指定的觸控已擷取至這個項目，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.UIElement3D.CaptureTouch%2A> will return `false` if the <xref:System.Windows.Input.TouchDevice> is currently captured to another element.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.UIElement3D.CaptureTouch%2A> 會傳回`false`如果<xref:System.Windows.Input.TouchDevice>目前擷取另一個項目。

trans-unit.source: If <xref:System.Windows.UIElement3D.CaptureTouch%2A> returns `true`, then the <xref:System.Windows.UIElement3D.GotTouchCapture> event is raised.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Windows.UIElement3D.CaptureTouch%2A>傳回`true`，然後在<xref:System.Windows.UIElement3D.GotTouchCapture>就會引發事件。

trans-unit.source: To release capture of a single touch from this element, use the <xref:System.Windows.UIElement3D.ReleaseTouchCapture%2A> method and specify the touch device to release.
trans-unit.target: 若要釋放擷取的單一觸控從這個項目，使用<xref:System.Windows.UIElement3D.ReleaseTouchCapture%2A>方法並指定要發行的觸控式裝置。

trans-unit.source: To release all touches from this element, use the <xref:System.Windows.UIElement3D.ReleaseAllTouchCaptures%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 若要釋放所有的工作，從這個項目，使用<xref:System.Windows.UIElement3D.ReleaseAllTouchCaptures%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="touchDevice" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="touchDevice" /> 為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets a collection of <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.CommandBinding" /> objects associated with this element.
trans-unit.target: 取得與這個項目關聯的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.CommandBinding" /> 物件集合。

trans-unit.source: The collection of all <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.CommandBinding" /> objects.
trans-unit.target: 所有 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.CommandBinding" /> 物件的集合。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandBinding> enables command handling of a specific command for this element, and declares the linkage between a command, its events, and the handlers attached by this element.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandBinding>啟用這個項目的特定命令的命令處理，並宣告命令、 其事件，以及由這個項目附加的處理常式之間的連結。

trans-unit.source: Another typical way to populate the <xref:System.Windows.UIElement3D.CommandBindings%2A> collection is to use <xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandManager> methods programmatically.
trans-unit.target: 典型的另一種方式填入<xref:System.Windows.UIElement3D.CommandBindings%2A>集合是使用<xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandManager>方法以程式設計的方式。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.UIElement3D.CommandBindings%2A> is introduced in the .NET Framework version 3.5.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.UIElement3D.CommandBindings%2A> .NET Framework 3.5 版中引進。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Versions and Dependencies](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[版本和相依性](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md)。

trans-unit.source: XAML Property Element Usage
trans-unit.target: XAML 屬性項目用法

trans-unit.source: XAML Values
trans-unit.target: XAML 值

trans-unit.source: *oneOrMoreCommandBindings*
trans-unit.target: *oneOrMoreCommandBindings*

trans-unit.source: One or more <xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandBinding> elements.
trans-unit.target: 一或多個<xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandBinding>項目。

trans-unit.source: Each of these should have a <xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandBinding.Command%2A> attribute set to a known command, and attributes set for the <xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandBinding.CanExecute> and <xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandBinding.Executed> handler implementations.
trans-unit.target: 每一個都應該有<xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandBinding.Command%2A>屬性設定為已知的命令，而且屬性設定為<xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandBinding.CanExecute>和<xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandBinding.Executed>處理常式實作。

trans-unit.source: For more information see <xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandBinding>.
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱<xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandBinding>。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the input system reports an underlying drag event with this element as the drag target.
trans-unit.target: 輸入系統報告其下以此項目作為拖曳目標的拖曳事件時發生。

trans-unit.source: This event creates an alias for the <xref:System.Windows.DragDrop.DragEnter?displayProperty=nameWithType> attached event for this class, so that <xref:System.Windows.UIElement3D.DragEnter?displayProperty=nameWithType> is part of the class members list when <xref:System.Windows.UIElement3D> is inherited as a base element.
trans-unit.target: 此事件會建立一個別名<xref:System.Windows.DragDrop.DragEnter?displayProperty=nameWithType>附加事件，這個類別，以便<xref:System.Windows.UIElement3D.DragEnter?displayProperty=nameWithType>屬於類別的成員 清單時<xref:System.Windows.UIElement3D>繼承基底的項目。

trans-unit.source: Event handlers that are attached to the <xref:System.Windows.UIElement3D.DragEnter> event are attached to the underlying <xref:System.Windows.DragDrop.DragEnter?displayProperty=nameWithType> attached event and receive the same event data instance.
trans-unit.target: 事件處理常式附加至<xref:System.Windows.UIElement3D.DragEnter>事件會附加至基礎<xref:System.Windows.DragDrop.DragEnter?displayProperty=nameWithType>附加事件和接收相同的事件資料執行個體。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.UIElement3D.DragEnter> is introduced in the .NET Framework version 3.5.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.UIElement3D.DragEnter> .NET Framework 3.5 版中引進。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Versions and Dependencies](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[版本和相依性](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md)。

trans-unit.target: 路由事件資訊

trans-unit.target: 識別項欄位

trans-unit.source: Routing strategy
trans-unit.target: 路由策略

trans-unit.target: 反昇

trans-unit.target: Delegate - 委派

trans-unit.source: The corresponding tunneling event is <xref:System.Windows.UIElement3D.PreviewDragEnter>.
trans-unit.target: 對應通道的事件<xref:System.Windows.UIElement3D.PreviewDragEnter>。

trans-unit.source: Override <xref:System.Windows.UIElement3D.OnDragEnter%2A> to implement class handling for this event in derived classes.
trans-unit.target: 覆寫<xref:System.Windows.UIElement3D.OnDragEnter%2A>實作在衍生類別中這個事件的類別處理。

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <see cref="E:System.Windows.UIElement3D.DragEnter" /> routed event.
trans-unit.target: 識別 <see cref="E:System.Windows.UIElement3D.DragEnter" /> 路由事件。

trans-unit.source: Routed event identifiers are created when routed events are registered.
trans-unit.target: 註冊路由事件時，會建立路由事件識別項。

trans-unit.source: These identifiers contain an identifying name, owner type, handler type, routing strategy, and utility method for adding owners for the event.
trans-unit.target: 這些識別項包含用於加入事件擁有者的識別名稱、擁有者類型、處理常式類型、路由策略和公用程式方法。

trans-unit.source: You can use these identifiers to add class handlers.
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用這些識別項來加入類別處理常式。

trans-unit.source: For more information about registering routed events, see <xref:System.Windows.EventManager.RegisterRoutedEvent%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 如需註冊路由事件的詳細資訊，請參閱 <xref:System.Windows.EventManager.RegisterRoutedEvent%2A>。

trans-unit.source: For more information about using routed event identifiers to add class handlers, see <xref:System.Windows.EventManager.RegisterClassHandler%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 如需使用路由事件識別項來加入類別處理常式的詳細資訊，請參閱 <xref:System.Windows.EventManager.RegisterClassHandler%2A>。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.UIElement3D.DragEnterEvent> is introduced in the .NET Framework version 3.5.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.UIElement3D.DragEnterEvent> .NET Framework 3.5 版中引進。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Versions and Dependencies](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[版本和相依性](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md)。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the input system reports an underlying drag event with this element as the drag origin.
trans-unit.target: 輸入系統報告其下以此項目作為拖曳來源的拖曳事件時發生。

trans-unit.source: This event creates an alias for the <xref:System.Windows.DragDrop.DragLeave?displayProperty=nameWithType> attached event for this class so that <xref:System.Windows.UIElement3D.DragLeave?displayProperty=nameWithType> is part of the class members list when <xref:System.Windows.UIElement3D> is inherited as a base element.
trans-unit.target: 此事件會建立一個別名<xref:System.Windows.DragDrop.DragLeave?displayProperty=nameWithType>附加這個類別的事件，讓<xref:System.Windows.UIElement3D.DragLeave?displayProperty=nameWithType>屬於類別的成員 清單時<xref:System.Windows.UIElement3D>繼承基底的項目。

trans-unit.source: Event handlers that are attached to the <xref:System.Windows.UIElement3D.DragLeave> event are attached to the underlying <xref:System.Windows.DragDrop.DragLeave?displayProperty=nameWithType> attached event and receive the same event data instance.
trans-unit.target: 事件處理常式附加至<xref:System.Windows.UIElement3D.DragLeave>事件會附加至基礎<xref:System.Windows.DragDrop.DragLeave?displayProperty=nameWithType>附加事件和接收相同的事件資料執行個體。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.UIElement3D.DragLeave> is introduced in the .NET Framework version 3.5.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.UIElement3D.DragLeave> .NET Framework 3.5 版中引進。

trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[版本和相依性](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md)。

trans-unit.target: 這些識別項包含用於加入事件擁有者的識別名稱、擁有者類型、處理常式類型、路由策略和公用程式方法。

trans-unit.source: You can use these identifiers to add class handlers.

trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.UIElement3D.DragLeaveEvent> .NET Framework 3.5 版中引進。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the input system reports an underlying drag event with this element as the potential drop target.
trans-unit.target: 在輸入系統回報以此項目作為可能置放目標的基礎拖曳事件時發生。

trans-unit.source: This event occurs even if the drag originates in the element bounds.
trans-unit.target: 即使拖曳來自項目範圍中，就會發生此事件。

trans-unit.source: If the drag starts outside the bounds and then moves inside, this event is also raised, as well as <xref:System.Windows.UIElement3D.DragEnter> and related preview events.
trans-unit.target: 如果拖曳啟動界限之外，然後移動到內部，也會引發這個事件，以及<xref:System.Windows.UIElement3D.DragEnter>和相關的預覽事件。

trans-unit.source: This event creates an alias for the <xref:System.Windows.DragDrop.DragOver?displayProperty=nameWithType> attached event for this class so that <xref:System.Windows.UIElement3D.DragOver?displayProperty=nameWithType> is part of the class members list when <xref:System.Windows.UIElement3D> is inherited as a base element.
trans-unit.target: 此事件會建立一個別名<xref:System.Windows.DragDrop.DragOver?displayProperty=nameWithType>附加這個類別的事件，讓<xref:System.Windows.UIElement3D.DragOver?displayProperty=nameWithType>屬於類別的成員 清單時<xref:System.Windows.UIElement3D>繼承基底的項目。

trans-unit.source: Event handlers that are attached to the <xref:System.Windows.UIElement3D.DragOver> event are attached to the underlying <xref:System.Windows.DragDrop.DragOver?displayProperty=nameWithType> attached event and receive the same event data instance.
trans-unit.target: 事件處理常式附加至<xref:System.Windows.UIElement3D.DragOver>事件會附加至基礎<xref:System.Windows.DragDrop.DragOver?displayProperty=nameWithType>附加事件和接收相同的事件資料執行個體。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.UIElement3D.DragOver> is introduced in the .NET Framework version 3.5.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.UIElement3D.DragOver> .NET Framework 3.5 版中引進。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Versions and Dependencies](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[版本和相依性](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md)。

trans-unit.source: Routed Event Information

trans-unit.source: Identifier field

trans-unit.source: The corresponding tunneling event is <xref:System.Windows.UIElement3D.PreviewDragOver>.
trans-unit.target: 對應通道的事件<xref:System.Windows.UIElement3D.PreviewDragOver>。

trans-unit.source: Override <xref:System.Windows.UIElement3D.OnDragOver%2A> to implement class handling for this event in derived classes.
trans-unit.target: 覆寫<xref:System.Windows.UIElement3D.OnDragOver%2A>實作在衍生類別中這個事件的類別處理。

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <see cref="E:System.Windows.UIElement3D.DragOver" /> routed event.
trans-unit.target: 識別 <see cref="E:System.Windows.UIElement3D.DragOver" /> 路由事件。

trans-unit.source: Routed event identifiers are created when routed events are registered.
trans-unit.target: 註冊路由事件時，會建立路由事件識別項。

trans-unit.source: These identifiers contain an identifying name, owner type, handler type, routing strategy, and utility method for adding owners for the event.
trans-unit.target: 這些識別項包含用於加入事件擁有者的識別名稱、擁有者類型、處理常式類型、路由策略和公用程式方法。

trans-unit.source: You can use these identifiers to add class handlers.
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用這些識別項來加入類別處理常式。

trans-unit.source: For more information about registering routed events, see <xref:System.Windows.EventManager.RegisterRoutedEvent%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 如需註冊路由事件的詳細資訊，請參閱 <xref:System.Windows.EventManager.RegisterRoutedEvent%2A>。

trans-unit.source: For more information about using routed event identifiers to add class handlers, see <xref:System.Windows.EventManager.RegisterClassHandler%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 如需使用路由事件識別項來加入類別處理常式的詳細資訊，請參閱 <xref:System.Windows.EventManager.RegisterClassHandler%2A>。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.UIElement3D.DragOverEvent> is introduced in the .NET Framework version 3.5.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.UIElement3D.DragOverEvent> .NET Framework 3.5 版中引進。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Versions and Dependencies](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[版本和相依性](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md)。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the input system reports an underlying drop event with this element as the drop target.
trans-unit.target: 輸入系統報告其下以這個項目作為置放目標的置放事件時發生。

trans-unit.source: This event creates an alias for the <xref:System.Windows.DragDrop.Drop?displayProperty=nameWithType> attached event for this class so that <xref:System.Windows.UIElement3D.Drop?displayProperty=nameWithType> is part of the class members list when <xref:System.Windows.UIElement3D> is inherited as a base element.
trans-unit.target: 此事件會建立一個別名<xref:System.Windows.DragDrop.Drop?displayProperty=nameWithType>附加這個類別的事件，讓<xref:System.Windows.UIElement3D.Drop?displayProperty=nameWithType>屬於類別的成員 清單時<xref:System.Windows.UIElement3D>繼承基底的項目。

trans-unit.source: Event handlers that are attached to the <xref:System.Windows.UIElement3D.Drop> event are attached to the underlying <xref:System.Windows.DragDrop.Drop?displayProperty=nameWithType> attached event and receive the same event data instance.
trans-unit.target: 事件處理常式附加至<xref:System.Windows.UIElement3D.Drop>事件會附加至基礎<xref:System.Windows.DragDrop.Drop?displayProperty=nameWithType>附加事件和接收相同的事件資料執行個體。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.UIElement3D.Drop> is introduced in the .NET Framework version 3.5.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.UIElement3D.Drop> .NET Framework 3.5 版中引進。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Versions and Dependencies](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[版本和相依性](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md)。

trans-unit.source: You can use these identifiers to add class handlers.
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用這些識別項來加入類別處理常式。

trans-unit.source: Attempts to set the logical focus on this element.
trans-unit.target: 嘗試在項目上設定邏輯焦點。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if both logical and keyboard focus were set to this element; <see langword="false" /> if only logical focus was set.
trans-unit.target: 如果邏輯與鍵盤焦點皆設定至此項目則為 <see langword="true" />，如果只有設定邏輯焦點則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: To be focusable, <xref:System.Windows.UIElement3D.Focusable%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.UIElement3D.IsEnabled%2A> must both be `true`.
trans-unit.target: 若要可設定焦點，<xref:System.Windows.UIElement3D.Focusable%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.UIElement3D.IsEnabled%2A>兩者都必須是`true`。

trans-unit.source: Even if an element is focusable and enabled, event handling within a specific tree, (such as for a composite control) might respond to the preview focus events by not allowing focus there, thus this method would return `false`.
trans-unit.target: 即使項目是在特定的樹狀結構中的可設定焦點且已啟用，事件處理，（例如，針對複合控制項） 可能會回應預覽焦點事件藉由禁止焦點，因此這個方法會傳回`false`。

trans-unit.source: If calling <xref:System.Windows.UIElement3D.Focus%2A> returns `true`, <xref:System.Windows.UIElement3D.IsKeyboardFocused%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.UIElement3D.IsKeyboardFocusWithin%2A> are also `true`.
trans-unit.target: 如果呼叫<xref:System.Windows.UIElement3D.Focus%2A>傳回`true`，<xref:System.Windows.UIElement3D.IsKeyboardFocused%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.UIElement3D.IsKeyboardFocusWithin%2A>也`true`。

trans-unit.source: If the related properties are not already `true`, when you call <xref:System.Windows.UIElement3D.Focus%2A>, one or more of the following events are raised in the following order: <xref:System.Windows.UIElement3D.PreviewLostKeyboardFocus>, <xref:System.Windows.UIElement3D.PreviewGotKeyboardFocus> (source is the new focus target), <xref:System.Windows.UIElement3D.IsKeyboardFocusedChanged>, <xref:System.Windows.UIElement3D.IsKeyboardFocusWithinChanged>, <xref:System.Windows.UIElement3D.LostKeyboardFocus>, <xref:System.Windows.UIElement3D.GotKeyboardFocus> (source is the new focus target).
trans-unit.target: 如果相關的屬性尚未`true`，當您呼叫<xref:System.Windows.UIElement3D.Focus%2A>，一或多個下列事件會依照下列順序引發： <xref:System.Windows.UIElement3D.PreviewLostKeyboardFocus>， <xref:System.Windows.UIElement3D.PreviewGotKeyboardFocus> （來源為新的焦點目標） <xref:System.Windows.UIElement3D.IsKeyboardFocusedChanged>， <xref:System.Windows.UIElement3D.IsKeyboardFocusWithinChanged>，<xref:System.Windows.UIElement3D.LostKeyboardFocus>， <xref:System.Windows.UIElement3D.GotKeyboardFocus> （來源為新的焦點目標）。

trans-unit.source: In order for this call to be successful, some other element in the application needed to have focus previously.
trans-unit.target: 為了讓這個呼叫才會成功，應用程式中的某個其他項目需要先前有焦點。

trans-unit.source: Focus in general is governed by two separate concepts: keyboard focus and logical focus, which are not always identical.
trans-unit.target: 焦點通常由兩個不同的概念： 鍵盤焦點和邏輯焦點，並不一定相同。

trans-unit.source: This method sets the logical focus, and also attempts to set the keyboard focus.
trans-unit.target: 此方法會設定邏輯焦點，而且嘗試設定鍵盤焦點。

trans-unit.source: There is no programmatic means to set keyboard focus specifically, this happens due to user input.
trans-unit.target: 沒有任何程式設計的方法，來設定鍵盤焦點具體來說，這是由使用者輸入。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Input Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/input-overview.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[輸入概觀](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/input-overview.md)。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.UIElement3D.Focus%2A> is introduced in the .NET Framework version 3.5.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.UIElement3D.Focus%2A> .NET Framework 3.5 版中引進。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Versions and Dependencies](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[版本和相依性](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md)。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the element can receive focus.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定元素是否能夠接收焦點的值。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the element is focusable; otherwise <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果項目可設定焦點則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 預設值為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Only the focused element receives keyboard input.
trans-unit.target: 只有已取得焦點的項目收到鍵盤輸入。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.UIElement3D.Focusable%2A> is the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_net](~/includes/tlasharptla-net-md.md)] property accessor for what is in reality a dependency property.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.UIElement3D.Focusable%2A> 是[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_net](~/includes/tlasharptla-net-md.md)]實際上會相依性屬性的屬性存取子。

trans-unit.source: This particular dependency property quite frequently has its apparent "default" value set differently in derived element classes.
trans-unit.target: 這個特定的相依性屬性相當常有衍生的項目類別中以不同的方式設定其明顯"default"值。

trans-unit.source: This commonly occurs in one of two ways:
trans-unit.target: 這通常會發生在兩種方式之一：

trans-unit.source: The dependency property is inherited by a particular derived class, but that derived class overrides the metadata of the dependency property and changes the property default value.
trans-unit.target: 相依性屬性繼承自特定的衍生類別，但是，衍生類別覆寫之相依性屬性的中繼資料，並變更屬性的預設值。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.UIElement3D.Focusable%2A> is introduced in the .NET Framework version 3.5.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.UIElement3D.Focusable%2A> .NET Framework 3.5 版中引進。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Versions and Dependencies](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[版本和相依性](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md)。

trans-unit.target: 相依性屬性資訊

trans-unit.source: Identifier field
trans-unit.target: 識別項欄位

trans-unit.source: Metadata properties set to `true`
trans-unit.target: 中繼資料屬性設定為 `true`

trans-unit.source: None
trans-unit.target: 無

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the value of the <see cref="P:System.Windows.UIElement3D.Focusable" /> property changes.
trans-unit.target: 發生於 <see cref="P:System.Windows.UIElement3D.Focusable" /> 屬性的值變更時。

trans-unit.target: 這個成員是[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_clr](~/includes/tla2sharptla-clr-md.md)]事件，則不是路由的事件。

trans-unit.target: 識別 <see cref="P:System.Windows.UIElement3D.Focusable" /> 相依性屬性。

trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[版本和相依性](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md)。

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, returns an alternative [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_ui](~/includes/tlasharptla-ui-md.md)] parent for this element if no visual parent exists.
trans-unit.target: 當在衍生類別中覆寫時，如果沒有視覺化父項目存在，則會為這個項目傳回替代的[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_ui](~/includes/tlasharptla-ui-md.md)] 父項目。

trans-unit.source: An object, if implementation of a derived class has an alternate parent connection to report.
trans-unit.target: 一個物件，如果衍生類別的實作有替代父代連接要報告。

trans-unit.source: The default virtual implementation of this method returns `null`.
trans-unit.target: 預設的虛擬實作這個方法會傳回`null`。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement> provides a practical implementation.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement> 提供實際的實作。

trans-unit.source: Alternative parents are used for event routing, in cases where an element creates an alternative parent structure so that its events are routed in a way that diverges from the standard pattern of routing up the visual tree to the standard parent, or downward in the preview routing strategy.
trans-unit.target: 替代的父代是用於事件的路由，在其中項目會建立替代父結構，讓它的事件會路由傳送偏離標準模式的視覺化樹狀目錄以標準的父代，路由的方式的情況下或在中向下預覽路由策略。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.UIElement3D.GetUIParentCore%2A> is introduced in the .NET Framework version 3.5.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.UIElement3D.GetUIParentCore%2A> .NET Framework 3.5 版中引進。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Versions and Dependencies](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[版本和相依性](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md)。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the input system reports an underlying drag-and-drop event that involves this element.
trans-unit.target: 輸入系統報告其下牽涉此元素的拖放事件時發生。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.UIElement3D.GiveFeedback> event allows the source of a drag event to modify the appearance of the mouse pointer in order to give the user visual feedback during a drag-and-drop operation.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.UIElement3D.GiveFeedback>事件允許拖曳事件修改滑鼠指標外觀，以便將使用者視覺化回應提供拖放作業期間的來源。

trans-unit.source: The visual feedback reinforces that a drag-and-drop operation is in process.
trans-unit.target: 視覺回應強調拖放作業正在進行。

trans-unit.source: This event creates an alias for the <xref:System.Windows.DragDrop.GiveFeedback?displayProperty=nameWithType> attached event for this class so that <xref:System.Windows.UIElement3D.GiveFeedback> is part of the class members list when <xref:System.Windows.UIElement3D> is inherited as a base element.
trans-unit.target: 此事件會建立一個別名<xref:System.Windows.DragDrop.GiveFeedback?displayProperty=nameWithType>附加這個類別的事件，讓<xref:System.Windows.UIElement3D.GiveFeedback>屬於類別的成員 清單時<xref:System.Windows.UIElement3D>繼承基底的項目。

trans-unit.source: Event handlers that are attached to the <xref:System.Windows.UIElement3D.GiveFeedback> event are attached to the underlying <xref:System.Windows.DragDrop.GiveFeedback?displayProperty=nameWithType> attached event and receive the same event data instance.
trans-unit.target: 事件處理常式附加至<xref:System.Windows.UIElement3D.GiveFeedback>事件會附加至基礎<xref:System.Windows.DragDrop.GiveFeedback?displayProperty=nameWithType>附加事件和接收相同的事件資料執行個體。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.UIElement3D.GiveFeedback> is introduced in the .NET Framework version 3.5.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.UIElement3D.GiveFeedback> .NET Framework 3.5 版中引進。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Versions and Dependencies](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[版本和相依性](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md)。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when this element gets logical focus.
trans-unit.target: 此元素取得邏輯焦點時發生。

trans-unit.source: Logical focus differs from keyboard focus if focus is deliberately forced by using a method call but the previous keyboard focus exists in a different scope.
trans-unit.target: 如果使用方法呼叫刻意強制焦點，但上一個鍵盤焦點存在於不同的範圍與鍵盤焦點不同邏輯焦點。

trans-unit.source: In this scenario, keyboard focus remains where it is and the element where a <xref:System.Windows.UIElement3D.Focus%2A> method is called still gets logical focus.
trans-unit.target: 在此案例中，鍵盤焦點會維持其所在和項目位置<xref:System.Windows.UIElement3D.Focus%2A>方法呼叫仍取得邏輯焦點。

trans-unit.source: A more precise interpretation of this event is that it is raised when the value of the <xref:System.Windows.UIElement3D.IsFocused%2A> property of an element in the route is changed from `false` to `true`.
trans-unit.target: 這個事件的更精確的解釋是它時引發的值<xref:System.Windows.UIElement3D.IsFocused%2A>屬性路由的項目已從`false`至`true`。

trans-unit.source: Because this event uses bubbling routing, the element that receives focus might be a child element instead of the element where the event handler is actually attached.
trans-unit.target: 由於這個事件會使用反昇路由，接收焦點的項目可能是子元素，而非項目實際附加事件處理常式。

trans-unit.source: Check the <xref:System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs.Source%2A> in the event data to determine the actual element that gained focus.
trans-unit.target: 請檢查<xref:System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs.Source%2A>事件資料來判斷實際取得焦點的項目中。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.UIElement3D.GotFocus> is introduced in the .NET Framework version 3.5.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.UIElement3D.GotFocus> .NET Framework 3.5 版中引進。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Versions and Dependencies](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[版本和相依性](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md)。

trans-unit.target: 覆寫<xref:System.Windows.UIElement3D.OnGotFocus%2A>實作在衍生類別中這個事件的類別處理。

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <see cref="E:System.Windows.UIElement3D.GotFocus" /> routed event.
trans-unit.target: 識別 <see cref="E:System.Windows.UIElement3D.GotFocus" /> 路由事件。

trans-unit.source: Routed event identifiers are created when routed events are registered.
trans-unit.target: 註冊路由事件時，會建立路由事件識別項。

trans-unit.source: These identifiers contain an identifying name, owner type, handler type, routing strategy, and utility method for adding owners for the event.
trans-unit.target: 這些識別項包含用於加入事件擁有者的識別名稱、擁有者類型、處理常式類型、路由策略和公用程式方法。

trans-unit.source: You can use these identifiers to add class handlers.
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用這些識別項來加入類別處理常式。

trans-unit.source: For more information about registering routed events, see <xref:System.Windows.EventManager.RegisterRoutedEvent%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 如需註冊路由事件的詳細資訊，請參閱 <xref:System.Windows.EventManager.RegisterRoutedEvent%2A>。

trans-unit.source: For more information about using routed event identifiers to add class handlers, see <xref:System.Windows.EventManager.RegisterClassHandler%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 如需使用路由事件識別項來加入類別處理常式的詳細資訊，請參閱 <xref:System.Windows.EventManager.RegisterClassHandler%2A>。

trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.UIElement3D.GotFocusEvent> .NET Framework 3.5 版中引進。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Versions and Dependencies](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md).

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the keyboard is focused on this element.
trans-unit.target: 鍵盤以此元素為焦點時發生。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.UIElement3D.IsKeyboardFocusedChanged> is a similar event that tracks status changes in a property that maintains the focus state for an element; the <xref:System.Windows.UIElement3D.GotKeyboardFocus> event is raised in many of the same circumstances.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.UIElement3D.IsKeyboardFocusedChanged> 是類似的事件可追蹤之屬性維護的項目; 焦點狀態中的狀態變更<xref:System.Windows.UIElement3D.GotKeyboardFocus>的許多相同的情況下，就會引發事件。

trans-unit.source: Because this event uses bubbling routing, the element that has focus might be a child element instead of the element where the event handler is actually attached.
trans-unit.target: 這個事件會使用反昇路由，因為具有焦點的項目可能是子元素，而非項目實際附加事件處理常式。

trans-unit.source: Check the <xref:System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs.Source%2A> in the event data to determine the actual element that has focus.
trans-unit.target: 請檢查<xref:System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs.Source%2A>事件資料來判斷實際具有焦點的項目中。

trans-unit.source: This event creates an alias for the <xref:System.Windows.Input.Keyboard.GotKeyboardFocus?displayProperty=nameWithType> attached event for this class so that <xref:System.Windows.UIElement3D.GotKeyboardFocus> is part of the class members list when <xref:System.Windows.UIElement3D> is inherited as a base element.
trans-unit.target: 此事件會建立一個別名<xref:System.Windows.Input.Keyboard.GotKeyboardFocus?displayProperty=nameWithType>附加這個類別的事件，讓<xref:System.Windows.UIElement3D.GotKeyboardFocus>屬於類別的成員 清單時<xref:System.Windows.UIElement3D>繼承基底的項目。

trans-unit.source: Event handlers that are attached to the <xref:System.Windows.UIElement3D.GotKeyboardFocus> event are attached to the underlying <xref:System.Windows.Input.Keyboard.GotKeyboardFocus?displayProperty=nameWithType> attached event and receive the same event data instance.
trans-unit.target: 事件處理常式附加至<xref:System.Windows.UIElement3D.GotKeyboardFocus>事件會附加至基礎<xref:System.Windows.Input.Keyboard.GotKeyboardFocus?displayProperty=nameWithType>附加事件和接收相同的事件資料執行個體。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.UIElement3D.GotKeyboardFocus> is introduced in the .NET Framework version 3.5.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.UIElement3D.GotKeyboardFocus> .NET Framework 3.5 版中引進。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Versions and Dependencies](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[版本和相依性](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md)。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when this element captures the mouse.
trans-unit.target: 此元素擷取滑鼠時發生。

trans-unit.source: When an element captures the mouse, it receives mouse input even if the mouse pointer is outside its bounds.
trans-unit.target: 當項目捕捉到滑鼠時，它收到滑鼠輸入，即使將滑鼠指標位於其範圍外。

trans-unit.source: The mouse is typically captured only during drag-and-drop operations and remains captured until the drop action of the drag-and-drop operation occurs.
trans-unit.target: 滑鼠通常只會在拖放作業期間擷取並且擷取之前拖放作業的拖放動作發生。

trans-unit.source: Because this event uses bubbling routing, the element that has capture might be a child element instead of the element where the event handler is actually attached.
trans-unit.target: 這個事件會使用反昇路由，因為已擷取的項目可能是子元素，而非項目實際附加事件處理常式。

trans-unit.source: Check the <xref:System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs.Source%2A> in the event data to determine the actual element that has mouse capture.
trans-unit.target: 請檢查<xref:System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs.Source%2A>資料，以判斷實際項目具有滑鼠擷取的事件。

trans-unit.source: This event creates an alias for the <xref:System.Windows.Input.Mouse.GotMouseCapture?displayProperty=nameWithType> attached event for this class so that <xref:System.Windows.UIElement3D.GotMouseCapture> is part of the class members list when <xref:System.Windows.UIElement3D> is inherited as a base element.
trans-unit.target: 此事件會建立一個別名<xref:System.Windows.Input.Mouse.GotMouseCapture?displayProperty=nameWithType>附加這個類別的事件，讓<xref:System.Windows.UIElement3D.GotMouseCapture>屬於類別的成員 清單時<xref:System.Windows.UIElement3D>繼承基底的項目。

trans-unit.source: Event handlers that are attached to the <xref:System.Windows.UIElement3D.GotMouseCapture> event are attached to the underlying <xref:System.Windows.Input.Mouse.GotMouseCapture?displayProperty=nameWithType> attached event and receive the same event data instance.
trans-unit.target: 事件處理常式附加至<xref:System.Windows.UIElement3D.GotMouseCapture>事件會附加至基礎<xref:System.Windows.Input.Mouse.GotMouseCapture?displayProperty=nameWithType>附加事件和接收相同的事件資料執行個體。

trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.UIElement3D.GotMouseCapture> .NET Framework 3.5 版中引進。

trans-unit.target: 此元素擷取手寫筆時發生。

trans-unit.source: When an element captures the stylus, it receives stylus input even if the pointer is outside its bounds.
trans-unit.target: 當項目擷取手寫筆時，即使指標位於其範圍外接收手寫筆輸入。

trans-unit.source: The stylus is typically captured only during drag-and-drop operations and retains capture until the drop action of the drag-and-drop operation occurs.
trans-unit.target: 手寫筆通常只會在拖放作業期間擷取，並保留擷取，直到拖放作業的拖放動作發生。

trans-unit.source: Because this event uses bubbling routing, the element that has capture might be a child element instead of the element where the event handler is actually attached.
trans-unit.target: 這個事件會使用反昇路由，因為已擷取的項目可能是子元素，而非項目實際附加事件處理常式。

trans-unit.source: Check the <xref:System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs.Source%2A> in the event data to determine the actual element that has capture.
trans-unit.target: 請檢查<xref:System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs.Source%2A>事件資料來判斷已擷取的實際項目中。

trans-unit.target: 此事件會建立這個類別的附加事件的別名，讓<xref:System.Windows.UIElement3D.GotStylusCapture>屬於類別的成員 清單時<xref:System.Windows.UIElement3D>繼承基底的項目。

trans-unit.source: Gets the collection of input bindings associated with this element.
trans-unit.target: 取得與此元素關聯的輸入繫結集合。

trans-unit.source: The collection of input bindings.
trans-unit.target: 輸入繫結的集合。

trans-unit.source: Input bindings support the binding of commands to input devices.
trans-unit.target: 輸入繫結支援命令與輸入裝置繫的結。

trans-unit.source: For example, <xref:System.Windows.Input.MouseBinding> implements input bindings that include properties that are particular to mouse devices.
trans-unit.target: 例如，<xref:System.Windows.Input.MouseBinding>實作輸入包含的滑鼠裝置特定內容的繫結。

trans-unit.source: The collection of input bindings will include both input bindings that pertain to the type as well as input bindings that are declared on the instance.
trans-unit.target: 輸入繫結的集合會包含屬於此類型的輸入繫結以及宣告執行個體的輸入繫結。

trans-unit.source: A related property, <xref:System.Windows.UIElement3D.CommandBindings%2A>, maintains a collection of command bindings.
trans-unit.target: 相關的屬性， <xref:System.Windows.UIElement3D.CommandBindings%2A>，維持命令繫結的集合。

trans-unit.source: These differ from input bindings in that they represent the next level down of command processing - actions that are tied to known commands.
trans-unit.target: 這些不同從輸入繫結，因為它們代表的下一個層級的動作會繫結至已知命令的命令處理。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.UIElement3D.InputBindings%2A> is introduced in the .NET Framework version 3.5.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.UIElement3D.InputBindings%2A> .NET Framework 3.5 版中引進。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Versions and Dependencies](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[版本和相依性](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md)。

trans-unit.source: XAML Property Element Usage
trans-unit.target: XAML 屬性項目用法

trans-unit.source: XAML Values
trans-unit.target: XAML 值

trans-unit.source: *oneOrMoreInputBindings*
trans-unit.target: *oneOrMoreInputBindings*

trans-unit.source: One or more <xref:System.Windows.Input.InputBinding> elements (typically the <xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyBinding> or <xref:System.Windows.Input.MouseBinding> derived classes).
trans-unit.target: 一或多個<xref:System.Windows.Input.InputBinding>項目 (通常<xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyBinding>或<xref:System.Windows.Input.MouseBinding>衍生類別)。

trans-unit.source: Each of these is expected to have a <xref:System.Windows.Input.InputBinding.Command%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Input.InputBinding.Gesture%2A> attribute set.
trans-unit.target: 每一個都應該要有<xref:System.Windows.Input.InputBinding.Command%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.Input.InputBinding.Gesture%2A>屬性設定。

trans-unit.source: Invalidates the model that represents the element.
trans-unit.target: 讓代表項目的模型失效。

trans-unit.source: When you derive a class from the <xref:System.Windows.UIElement3D> class, you can use this method together with the <xref:System.Windows.UIElement3D.OnUpdateModel%2A> method to refresh the model of the element.
trans-unit.target: 當您衍生自<xref:System.Windows.UIElement3D>類別，您可以使用這個方法並搭配<xref:System.Windows.UIElement3D.OnUpdateModel%2A>方法，以重新整理模型的項目。

trans-unit.source: You only need to call this method in advanced scenarios.
trans-unit.target: 您只需要在進階案例中呼叫這個方法。

trans-unit.source: One such advanced scenario is if the derived class has multiple properties that affect the appearance, and you want to update the underlying model only once.
trans-unit.target: 這類進階的案例之一就是在衍生的類別有多個屬性會影響外觀，並且您想要一次更新基礎的模型。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.UIElement3D.InvalidateModel%2A> is introduced in the .NET Framework version 3.5.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.UIElement3D.InvalidateModel%2A> .NET Framework 3.5 版中引進。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Versions and Dependencies](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[版本和相依性](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md)。

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to derive from the <xref:System.Windows.UIElement3D> class to create a `Sphere` class:
trans-unit.target: 下列範例示範如何從衍生<xref:System.Windows.UIElement3D>類別來建立`Sphere`類別：

trans-unit.source: For the complete sample, see [UIElement3D Sphere Sample](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=160044).
trans-unit.target: 如需完整範例，請參閱[UIElement3D 球體範例](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=160044)。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether this element is enabled in the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_ui](~/includes/tlasharptla-ui-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定值，這個值表示此項目是否在[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_ui](~/includes/tlasharptla-ui-md.md)] 中啟用。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the element is enabled; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果已啟用該項目則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The default value is <see langword="true" />.
trans-unit.target: 預設值是 <see langword="true" />。

trans-unit.source: Note that this property is influenced by class-specific implementations of <xref:System.Windows.UIElement3D.IsEnabledCore%2A> on particular elements, often at runtime.
trans-unit.target: 請注意這個屬性會受到特定類別的實作<xref:System.Windows.UIElement3D.IsEnabledCore%2A>特定項目，通常在執行階段。

trans-unit.source: Therefore, the default value listed here is sometimes not effective.
trans-unit.target: 因此，此處所列的預設值有時不是有效。

trans-unit.source: Attempting to set this value will also potentially be overridden by the value returned by <xref:System.Windows.UIElement3D.IsEnabledCore%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 嘗試設定此值將也可能會覆寫所傳回的值<xref:System.Windows.UIElement3D.IsEnabledCore%2A>。

trans-unit.source: Elements that are not enabled do not participate in hit testing or focus and therefore will not be sources of input events.
trans-unit.target: 未啟用的項目不會參與點擊測試或焦點，而且不會因此輸入事件的來源。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.UIElement3D.IsEnabled%2A> is introduced in the .NET Framework version 3.5.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.UIElement3D.IsEnabled%2A> .NET Framework 3.5 版中引進。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Versions and Dependencies](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[版本和相依性](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md)。

trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[版本和相依性](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md)。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that becomes the return value of <see cref="P:System.Windows.UIElement3D.IsEnabled" /> in derived classes.
trans-unit.target: 取得值，這個值會成為衍生類別中 <see cref="P:System.Windows.UIElement3D.IsEnabled" /> 的傳回值。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the element is enabled; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果已啟用該項目則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.UIElement3D.IsEnabledCore%2A> is introduced in the .NET Framework version 3.5.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.UIElement3D.IsEnabledCore%2A> .NET Framework 3.5 版中引進。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Versions and Dependencies](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[版本和相依性](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md)。

trans-unit.source: The default implementation of this property caches the value and also calculates whether the parent element of this element is enabled.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性的預設實作快取的值，而且也會計算這個項目之父項目是否已啟用。

trans-unit.source: (If the parent is not enabled, the child element cannot be effectively enabled in practical [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_ui](~/includes/tlasharptla-ui-md.md)].) If you choose to override this implementation, make certain that you call the base implementation to preserve this behavior.
trans-unit.target: (如果未啟用父代，無法在實際有效地啟用的子項目[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_ui](~/includes/tlasharptla-ui-md.md)]。)如果您選擇覆寫這個實作，請確定呼叫基底實作以保留此行為。

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <see cref="P:System.Windows.UIElement3D.IsEnabled" /> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: 識別 <see cref="P:System.Windows.UIElement3D.IsEnabled" /> 相依性屬性。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.UIElement3D.IsEnabledProperty> is introduced in the .NET Framework version 3.5.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.UIElement3D.IsEnabledProperty> .NET Framework 3.5 版中引進。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Versions and Dependencies](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[版本和相依性](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md)。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that determines whether this element has logical focus.
trans-unit.target: 取得值，決定這個項目是否具有邏輯焦點。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if this element has logical focus; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果這個項目擁有邏輯焦點則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Logical focus might differ from keyboard focus if an application has multiple focus divisions, such as between menu contents and the remainder of the application.
trans-unit.target: 如果某個應用程式多個焦點分區，例如功能表內容和應用程式的其餘部分之間，可能會與鍵盤焦點不同邏輯焦點。

trans-unit.source: In this scenario, keyboard focus can only be on one element of the application UI, however, certain elements in other focus divisions might still retain logical focus.
trans-unit.target: 在此案例中，應用程式 UI 的一個項目上只能是鍵盤焦點，不過，其他焦點分割中的特定項目可能仍會保留邏輯焦點。

trans-unit.source: For more information on logical focus, see [Focus Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/focus-overview.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需有關邏輯焦點的詳細資訊，請參閱[焦點概觀](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/focus-overview.md)。

trans-unit.source: You do not set focus by setting this property (it is read-only).
trans-unit.target: 您未設定此屬性 （它是唯讀） 設定焦點。

trans-unit.source: The typical use for this property is to use it as a dependency property for a <xref:System.Windows.Setter> or <xref:System.Windows.EventTrigger>.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性的典型用法就是使用它作為相依性屬性的<xref:System.Windows.Setter>或<xref:System.Windows.EventTrigger>。

trans-unit.source: To set focus programmatically, call <xref:System.Windows.UIElement3D.Focus%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 若要以程式設計方式設定焦點，呼叫<xref:System.Windows.UIElement3D.Focus%2A>。

trans-unit.source: Focus can also be set by user action or by control implementations, which possibly include mouse capture behavior.
trans-unit.target: 藉由使用者動作或控制項實作，其中可能包括滑鼠捕捉行為，也可以設定焦點。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.UIElement3D.IsFocused%2A> is introduced in the .NET Framework version 3.5.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.UIElement3D.IsFocused%2A> .NET Framework 3.5 版中引進。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Versions and Dependencies](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[版本和相依性](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md)。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that declares whether this element can possibly be returned as a hit test result from some portion of its rendered content.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定宣告此元素是否可以從其呈現內容的某些部分傳回，作為點擊測試結果的值。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if this element could be returned as a hit test result from at least one point; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果這個項目可從至少一個點當做點擊測試結果傳回則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The default value is <see langword="true" />.
trans-unit.target: 預設值是 <see langword="true" />。

trans-unit.source: The effective value of this property is influenced by the relative positions of hit testable elements in the logical tree.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性的有效值會受到點擊測試的項目邏輯樹狀中的相對位置。

trans-unit.source: For instance, if an element is a child element of an element that is not hit test visible, the effective value of the property on the child will remain `false`, even if attempting to set that value locally.
trans-unit.target: 比方說，如果某個元素的子元素的項目，不會叫用測試顯示，將會繼續的子系上屬性的有效值`false`，即使嘗試在本機設定該值。

trans-unit.source: For this reason, it is important that you do not set <xref:System.Windows.UIElement3D.IsHitTestVisible%2A> to `false` on a composited control unless you do not want any input or hit testing on that control.
trans-unit.target: 基於這個理由，請務必確認您未設定<xref:System.Windows.UIElement3D.IsHitTestVisible%2A>至`false`複合控制項上，除非您不想要的任何輸入或的點擊測試該控制項。

trans-unit.source: For more information on hit testing, see [Hit Testing in the Visual Layer](~/docs/framework/wpf/graphics-multimedia/hit-testing-in-the-visual-layer.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需點擊測試的詳細資訊，請參閱[視覺分層中的點擊測試](~/docs/framework/wpf/graphics-multimedia/hit-testing-in-the-visual-layer.md)。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.UIElement3D.IsHitTestVisible%2A> is introduced in the .NET Framework version 3.5.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.UIElement3D.IsHitTestVisible%2A> .NET Framework 3.5 版中引進。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Versions and Dependencies](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[版本和相依性](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md)。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether an input method system, such as an [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_ime](~/includes/tlasharptla-ime-md.md)], is enabled for processing the input to this element.
trans-unit.target: 取得值，這個值指出是否已啟用輸入方法系統，例如[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_ime](~/includes/tlasharptla-ime-md.md)]，以處理此項目的輸入。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if an input method is active; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果輸入方法作用中則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The default value of the underlying attached property is <see langword="true;" /> however, this will be influenced by the actual state of input methods at runtime.
trans-unit.target: 基礎附加屬性的預設值是<see langword="true;" />不過，這會受到輸入法在執行階段的實際狀態。

trans-unit.source: This property returns the value that is returned by the attached property <xref:System.Windows.Input.InputMethod.IsInputMethodEnabled%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> for the currently enabled input methods (keyboard, speech, other input devices).
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性會傳回附加的屬性所傳回的值<xref:System.Windows.Input.InputMethod.IsInputMethodEnabled%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>針對目前啟用輸入法 （keyboard、 語音、 其他輸入的裝置）。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.UIElement3D.IsInputMethodEnabled%2A> is introduced in the .NET Framework version 3.5.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.UIElement3D.IsInputMethodEnabled%2A> .NET Framework 3.5 版中引進。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Versions and Dependencies](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[版本和相依性](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md)。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether this element has keyboard focus.
trans-unit.target: 取得值，指出這個項目是否具有鍵盤焦點。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if this element has keyboard focus; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果這個項目具有鍵盤焦點則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 預設值為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Changes to the determined value of this property may be accompanied by focus-related events.
trans-unit.target: 決定的值，這個屬性的變更可能會伴隨焦點相關事件。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.UIElement3D.IsKeyboardFocused%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.UIElement3D.IsKeyboardFocusWithin%2A> are commonly used within class event handlers for other input-related events, for instance to determine whether the element already has keyboard focus, or to make determinations when mouse events and keyboard events occur in conjunction.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.UIElement3D.IsKeyboardFocused%2A> 和<xref:System.Windows.UIElement3D.IsKeyboardFocusWithin%2A>常用類別事件處理常式中的其他輸入相關的事件，例如來決定項目已經有鍵盤焦點，或進行決定當滑鼠事件和鍵盤事件一起出現。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.UIElement3D.IsKeyboardFocused%2A> is introduced in the .NET Framework version 3.5.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.UIElement3D.IsKeyboardFocused%2A> .NET Framework 3.5 版中引進。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Versions and Dependencies](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[版本和相依性](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md)。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether keyboard focus is anywhere within the element or its visual tree child elements.
trans-unit.target: 取得值，表示鍵盤焦點是否在項目或其視覺化樹狀子項目內的任何位置。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if keyboard focus is on the element or its child elements; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果鍵盤焦點在項目或其子項目上則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Changes to the value of this property typically raise the <xref:System.Windows.UIElement3D.IsKeyboardFocusWithinChanged> event, unless a derived class has overridden <xref:System.Windows.UIElement3D.OnIsKeyboardFocusWithinChanged%2A> to suppress the event.
trans-unit.target: 對這個屬性的值的變更通常引發<xref:System.Windows.UIElement3D.IsKeyboardFocusWithinChanged>事件，除非在衍生的類別已覆寫<xref:System.Windows.UIElement3D.OnIsKeyboardFocusWithinChanged%2A>来隱藏的事件。

trans-unit.source: You do not set this property directly, but you can set the focus to an element by calling <xref:System.Windows.UIElement3D.Focus%2A>, or by making a <xref:System.Windows.UIElement3D.MoveFocus%2A> request.
trans-unit.target: 您未設定這個屬性，但您也可以呼叫的項目設定焦點<xref:System.Windows.UIElement3D.Focus%2A>，或藉由<xref:System.Windows.UIElement3D.MoveFocus%2A>要求。

trans-unit.source: Either of these method calls might change this property value.
trans-unit.target: 這些方法會呼叫其中一項可能會變更這個屬性值。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.UIElement3D.IsKeyboardFocused%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.UIElement3D.IsKeyboardFocusWithin%2A> are typically used within class event handlers for other input-related events, for instance to determine whether the element already has keyboard focus, or to make determinations when mouse events and keyboard events occur in conjunction.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.UIElement3D.IsKeyboardFocused%2A> 和<xref:System.Windows.UIElement3D.IsKeyboardFocusWithin%2A>通常用於類別的事件處理常式中其他輸入相關的事件，例如來決定項目已經有鍵盤焦點，或進行決定當滑鼠事件和鍵盤事件一起出現。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.UIElement3D.IsKeyboardFocusWithin%2A> is introduced in the .NET Framework version 3.5.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.UIElement3D.IsKeyboardFocusWithin%2A> .NET Framework 3.5 版中引進。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Versions and Dependencies](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[版本和相依性](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md)。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the mouse is captured to this element.
trans-unit.target: 取得值，指出是否將滑鼠擷取至這個項目。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the element has mouse capture; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果項目已具有滑鼠捕捉則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 預設值為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Mouse capture state is related to in-process drag-and-drop operations.
trans-unit.target: 與處理序中的拖放作業相關的滑鼠捕捉的狀態。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.UIElement3D.IsMouseCaptured%2A> is introduced in the .NET Framework version 3.5.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.UIElement3D.IsMouseCaptured%2A> .NET Framework 3.5 版中引進。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Versions and Dependencies](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[版本和相依性](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md)。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that determines whether mouse capture is held by this element or by child elements in its visual tree.
trans-unit.target: 取得值，這個值決定滑鼠擷取是由這個項目持有，還是由其視覺化樹狀結構中的子項目持有。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if this element or a contained element has mouse capture; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果這個項目或包含的項目具有滑鼠捕捉則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.UIElement3D.IsMouseCaptureWithin%2A> .NET Framework 3.5 版中引進。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Versions and Dependencies](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[版本和相依性](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md)。
