trans-unit.source: Provides class handling for the <see cref="E:System.Windows.UIElement3D.GotTouchCapture" /> routed event that occurs when a touch is captured to this element.
trans-unit.target: 提供 <see cref="E:System.Windows.UIElement3D.GotTouchCapture" /> 路由事件的類別處理，而這個事件會在擷取到對此項目的觸控時發生。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.UIElement3D.OnGotTouchCapture%2A> method has no default implementation.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.UIElement3D.OnGotTouchCapture%2A>方法有預設的實作。

trans-unit.source: Override <xref:System.Windows.UIElement3D.OnGotTouchCapture%2A> in a derived class to handle the <xref:System.Windows.UIElement3D.GotTouchCapture> event.
trans-unit.target: 覆寫<xref:System.Windows.UIElement3D.OnGotTouchCapture%2A>處理衍生類別中<xref:System.Windows.UIElement3D.GotTouchCapture>事件。

trans-unit.source: Be sure to call the base class’s <xref:System.Windows.UIElement3D.OnGotTouchCapture%2A> method so that base classes receive the event.
trans-unit.target: 確定呼叫基底類別的<xref:System.Windows.UIElement3D.OnGotTouchCapture%2A>方法的基底類別，接收到事件。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.DependencyPropertyChangedEventArgs" /> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: 包含事件資料的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.DependencyPropertyChangedEventArgs" />。

trans-unit.source: Invoked when an unhandled <see cref="E:System.Windows.UIElement3D.IsKeyboardFocusedChanged" /> event is raised on this element.
trans-unit.target: 會在對這個項目引發未處理的 <see cref="E:System.Windows.UIElement3D.IsKeyboardFocusedChanged" /> 事件時被叫用。

trans-unit.source: Implement this method to add class handling for this event.
trans-unit.target: 實作這個方法可為此事件加入類別處理。

trans-unit.source: This virtual method is called when the value of the <xref:System.Windows.UIElement3D.IsKeyboardFocused%2A> dependency property changes.
trans-unit.target: 此虛擬方法時，會呼叫的值<xref:System.Windows.UIElement3D.IsKeyboardFocused%2A>相依性屬性變更。

trans-unit.source: The virtual method is called first and can manipulate the event data as necessary.
trans-unit.target: 會先呼叫虛擬方法，並可以操作需要的事件資料。

trans-unit.source: Then the <xref:System.Windows.UIElement3D.IsKeyboardFocusedChanged> event is raised with that same event data instance.
trans-unit.target: 然後在<xref:System.Windows.UIElement3D.IsKeyboardFocusedChanged>與該相同的事件資料執行個體就會引發事件。

trans-unit.source: Notice that the <xref:System.Windows.UIElement3D.IsKeyboardFocusedChanged> event is not a routed event.
trans-unit.target: 請注意，<xref:System.Windows.UIElement3D.IsKeyboardFocusedChanged>事件就不會路由的事件。

trans-unit.source: Therefore, you cannot mark it as handled in the class handler.
trans-unit.target: 因此，您無法將它標示為已處理的類別處理常式中。

trans-unit.source: This method has no default implementation.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會具有預設的實作。

trans-unit.source: Because an intermediate class in the inheritance might implement this method, we recommend that you call the base implementation in your implementation.
trans-unit.target: 因為中繼類別繼承中的可能會實作這個方法，我們建議您在自己的實作呼叫基底實作。

trans-unit.source: You may call base either before or after your special handling, depending on your requirements.
trans-unit.target: 您可能會呼叫基底之前或之後特殊處理，根據您的需求。

trans-unit.target: 這個方法會具有預設的實作。

trans-unit.source: Because an intermediate class in the inheritance might implement this method, we recommend that you call the base implementation in your implementation.
trans-unit.target: 因為中繼類別繼承中的可能會實作這個方法，我們建議您在自己的實作呼叫基底實作。

trans-unit.source: You may call base either before or after your special handling, depending on your requirements.
trans-unit.target: 您可能會呼叫基底之前或之後特殊處理，根據您的需求。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.UIElement3D.OnIsStylusDirectlyOverChanged%2A> is introduced in the .NET Framework version 3.5.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.UIElement3D.OnIsStylusDirectlyOverChanged%2A> .NET Framework 3.5 版中引進。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Versions and Dependencies](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md).

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.KeyEventArgs" /> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: 包含事件資料的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.KeyEventArgs" />。

trans-unit.source: Invoked when an unhandled <see cref="E:System.Windows.Input.Keyboard.KeyDown" /> attached event reaches an element in its route that is derived from this class.
trans-unit.target: 當未處理的 <see cref="E:System.Windows.Input.Keyboard.KeyDown" /> 附加事件到達其路由中衍生自此類別的項目時叫用。

trans-unit.source: Implement this method to add class handling for this event.
trans-unit.target: 實作這個方法可為此事件加入類別處理。

trans-unit.source: Keystrokes are handled by a dedicated input manager.
trans-unit.target: 按鍵動作是由專用的輸入管理員處理。

trans-unit.source: Other programming features that rely on keystrokes, for example, input and command bindings, might handle the keystroke before it is exposed as a general keystroke.
trans-unit.target: 依賴按鍵，例如，輸入和命令繫結的其他程式設計功能可能會處理按鍵之前它會公開為一般的按鍵。

trans-unit.source: If these input system features mark the event as handled, then <xref:System.Windows.UIElement3D.OnKeyDown%2A> is not invoked.
trans-unit.target: 如果這些輸入系統功能將事件標記為已處理，然後<xref:System.Windows.UIElement3D.OnKeyDown%2A>不會叫用。

trans-unit.source: This method has no default implementation.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會具有預設的實作。

trans-unit.source: Because an intermediate class in the inheritance might implement this method, we recommend that you call the base implementation in your implementation.
trans-unit.target: 因為中繼類別繼承中的可能會實作這個方法，我們建議您在自己的實作呼叫基底實作。

trans-unit.source: The purpose of this method is similar to the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_clr](~/includes/tlasharptla-clr-md.md)] event pattern On* methods: this method provides the means to handle the matching event from derived classes by establishing a class handler instead of an instance handler.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法的目的是類似於[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_clr](~/includes/tlasharptla-clr-md.md)]事件模式 * 方法： 這個方法會提供要藉由建立類別處理常式，而不是執行個體處理常式處理衍生類別的比對事件的方法。

trans-unit.source: In this case the matching event is a routed event.
trans-unit.target: 在此情況下，符合的事件是路由的事件。

trans-unit.source: The implementation pattern of the On* methods is different for routed events because a routed event can be raised by a child element, which is not necessarily the element that will invoke handlers.
trans-unit.target: 由於路由的事件就會引發子元素，不一定會叫用處理常式的項目，On * 方法的實作模式是不同的路由事件。

trans-unit.source: Therefore, your implementation needs to examine the source properties of the event data.
trans-unit.target: 因此，您的實作必須檢查的事件資料來源屬性。

trans-unit.source: It should not try to reraise the event in most cases.
trans-unit.target: 它不應嘗試重新引發此事件在大部分情況下。

trans-unit.source: Either by overriding this method or by registering class handlers with <xref:System.Windows.EventManager.RegisterClassHandler%2A>, derived classes of <xref:System.Windows.UIElement3D> can call private class handler methods when the event is received along the event route.
trans-unit.target: 覆寫這個方法，或登錄類別處理常式取代<xref:System.Windows.EventManager.RegisterClassHandler%2A>，衍生的類別<xref:System.Windows.UIElement3D>事件路由上收到事件時，可以呼叫私用類別處理常式方法。

trans-unit.source: One scenario where class handling is appropriate is to manipulate the event data and mark the routed event as handled.
trans-unit.target: 其中類別處理是適當的其中一個案例是操作事件資料，並標示為已處理的路由的事件。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.UIElement3D.OnKeyDown%2A> is introduced in the .NET Framework version 3.5.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.UIElement3D.OnKeyDown%2A> .NET Framework 3.5 版中引進。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Versions and Dependencies](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[版本和相依性](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md)。

trans-unit.target: 包含事件資料的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.KeyEventArgs" />。

trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[版本和相依性](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md)。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs" /> that contains event data.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs" />，包含事件資料。

trans-unit.source: This event data must contain the identifier for the <see cref="E:System.Windows.UIElement3D.LostFocus" /> event.
trans-unit.target: 此事件資料必須包含 <see cref="E:System.Windows.UIElement3D.LostFocus" /> 事件的識別項。

trans-unit.source: Raises the <see cref="E:System.Windows.UIElement3D.LostFocus" /> routed event by using the event data that is provided.
trans-unit.target: 使用所提供的事件資料引發 <see cref="E:System.Windows.UIElement3D.LostFocus" /> 路由事件。

trans-unit.source: This method, although virtual, does have a default implementation that raises the event.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法中，雖然是虛擬的沒有預設實作會引發事件。

trans-unit.source: This On* method implementation is intended to raise the event, and this same method implementation is invoked internally to raise the event when the <xref:System.Windows.UIElement3D.IsFocused%2A> property value changes.
trans-unit.target: 這在 * 方法實作用來引發事件，這個相同的方法實作會在內部叫用來引發事件時<xref:System.Windows.UIElement3D.IsFocused%2A>屬性值變更。

trans-unit.source: This implementation differs from some other [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)] On* implementations, which only provide a convenient way to add class handling for that event.
trans-unit.target: 這項實作不同於其他[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)]上 * 只提供便利的方式來加入類別處理事件的實作。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.UIElement3D.OnLostFocus%2A> is introduced in the .NET Framework version 3.5.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.UIElement3D.OnLostFocus%2A> .NET Framework 3.5 版中引進。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Versions and Dependencies](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[版本和相依性](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md)。

trans-unit.source: Unless you have a deliberate and unusual need to not raise the focus events, make sure that your implementation calls the base implementation.
trans-unit.target: 除非您有故意和不尋常的需要，將不會引發焦點事件，請確定您的實作呼叫基底實作。

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, the <see cref="E:System.Windows.UIElement3D.LostFocus" /> event is not raised during typical user operations that ordinarily set focus to this element.
trans-unit.target: 否則，<see cref="E:System.Windows.UIElement3D.LostFocus" />通常將焦點設定至這個項目的一般使用者作業期間將不會引發事件。

trans-unit.source: If you do not intend your element to be focusable, you can prevent the element from being focusable by setting <see cref="P:System.Windows.UIElement3D.Focusable" /> to <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果您不想要您可設定焦點的項目，您可以防止項目可設定焦點設定<see cref="P:System.Windows.UIElement3D.Focusable" />至<see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.target: 覆寫這個方法，或登錄類別處理常式取代<xref:System.Windows.EventManager.RegisterClassHandler%2A>，衍生的類別<xref:System.Windows.UIElement3D>事件路由上收到事件時，可以呼叫私用類別處理常式方法。

trans-unit.source: One scenario where class handling is appropriate is to manipulate the event data and mark the routed event as handled.
trans-unit.target: 其中類別處理是適當的其中一個案例是操作事件資料，並標示為已處理的路由的事件。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.UIElement3D.OnLostStylusCapture%2A> is introduced in the .NET Framework version 3.5.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.UIElement3D.OnLostStylusCapture%2A> .NET Framework 3.5 版中引進。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Versions and Dependencies](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[版本和相依性](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md)。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.TouchEventArgs" /> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.TouchEventArgs" />，其中包含事件資料。

trans-unit.source: Provides class handling for the <see cref="E:System.Windows.UIElement3D.LostTouchCapture" /> routed event that occurs when this element loses a touch capture.
trans-unit.target: 提供 <see cref="E:System.Windows.UIElement3D.LostTouchCapture" /> 路由事件的類別處理，而這個事件會在此項目失去觸控擷取時發生。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.UIElement3D.OnLostTouchCapture%2A> method has no default implementation.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.UIElement3D.OnLostTouchCapture%2A>方法有預設的實作。

trans-unit.source: Override <xref:System.Windows.UIElement3D.OnLostTouchCapture%2A> in a derived class to handle the <xref:System.Windows.UIElement3D.LostTouchCapture> event.
trans-unit.target: 覆寫<xref:System.Windows.UIElement3D.OnLostTouchCapture%2A>處理衍生類別中<xref:System.Windows.UIElement3D.LostTouchCapture>事件。

trans-unit.source: Be sure to call the base class’s <xref:System.Windows.UIElement3D.OnLostTouchCapture%2A> method so that base classes receive the event.
trans-unit.target: 確定呼叫基底類別的<xref:System.Windows.UIElement3D.OnLostTouchCapture%2A>方法的基底類別，接收到事件。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.MouseButtonEventArgs" /> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: 包含事件資料的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.MouseButtonEventArgs" />。

trans-unit.source: This event data reports details about the mouse button that was pressed and the handled state.
trans-unit.target: 此事件資料會報告有關按下的滑鼠按鈕以及已處理狀態的詳細資訊。

trans-unit.source: Invoked when an unhandled <see cref="E:System.Windows.Input.Mouse.MouseDown" /> attached event reaches an element in its route that is derived from this class.
trans-unit.target: 當未處理的 <see cref="E:System.Windows.Input.Mouse.MouseDown" /> 附加事件到達其路由中衍生自此類別的項目時叫用。

trans-unit.source: Implement this method to add class handling for this event.
trans-unit.target: 實作這個方法可為此事件加入類別處理。

trans-unit.source: Mouse button actions are also handled by a dedicated input manager.
trans-unit.target: 滑鼠按鈕動作也是由專用的輸入管理員處理。

trans-unit.source: Other programming features that rely on mouse button actions, such as input and command bindings, might invoke handlers for the action before it is exposed as a general mouse button action.
trans-unit.target: 依賴滑鼠按鈕的動作，例如輸入和命令繫結之前它會公開為一般的滑鼠按鈕動作, 可能會叫用動作的處理常式的其他程式設計功能。

trans-unit.source: If these input system features mark the <xref:System.Windows.Input.Mouse.MouseDown?displayProperty=nameWithType> event as handled, <xref:System.Windows.UIElement3D.OnMouseDown%2A> is not invoked.
trans-unit.target: 如果這些輸入系統功能標記<xref:System.Windows.Input.Mouse.MouseDown?displayProperty=nameWithType>事件為已處理，<xref:System.Windows.UIElement3D.OnMouseDown%2A>不會叫用。

trans-unit.source: If you use this class handler to mark the event as handled, you potentially impact the following events: <xref:System.Windows.UIElement3D.MouseLeftButtonDown> and <xref:System.Windows.UIElement3D.MouseRightButtonDown>.
trans-unit.target: 如果您使用這個類別處理常式來標示為已處理的事件時，可能會影響下列事件：<xref:System.Windows.UIElement3D.MouseLeftButtonDown>和<xref:System.Windows.UIElement3D.MouseRightButtonDown>。

trans-unit.source: Either of these events may be raised on the receiving element when <xref:System.Windows.Input.Mouse.MouseDown?displayProperty=nameWithType> is received.
trans-unit.target: 其中一個這些事件可能會接收的項目上引發時<xref:System.Windows.Input.Mouse.MouseDown?displayProperty=nameWithType>收到。

trans-unit.source: If you mark this event as handled in class handling, subevents are still raised; however, they pass the handled state in the event data.
trans-unit.target: 如果您要標示為已處理的類別中處理此事件，仍然會引發子;不過，它們將傳遞事件資料中處理的狀態。

trans-unit.source: If the event is handled in class handling, instance handlers for the subevents are not invoked unless you explicitly use <xref:System.Windows.UIElement3D.AddHandler%28System.Windows.RoutedEvent%2CSystem.Delegate%2CSystem.Boolean%29> with `handledEventsToo` `true` in order to attach handlers.
trans-unit.target: 如果在處理中的類別處理事件，副的執行個體處理常式不會叫用除非您明確地使用<xref:System.Windows.UIElement3D.AddHandler%28System.Windows.RoutedEvent%2CSystem.Delegate%2CSystem.Boolean%29>與`handledEventsToo``true`才能附加處理常式。

trans-unit.source: Class handlers also are not invoked unless those class handlers were registered with the <xref:System.Windows.EventManager.RegisterClassHandler%28System.Type%2CSystem.Windows.RoutedEvent%2CSystem.Delegate%2CSystem.Boolean%29> signature with `handledEventsToo` `true`.
trans-unit.target: 類別處理常式也不會叫用這些類別處理常式已向除非<xref:System.Windows.EventManager.RegisterClassHandler%28System.Type%2CSystem.Windows.RoutedEvent%2CSystem.Delegate%2CSystem.Boolean%29>簽章與`handledEventsToo` `true`。

trans-unit.source: By handling <xref:System.Windows.UIElement3D.OnMouseDown%2A>, you are implying that your class handling accounted for all possible mouse button down actions.
trans-unit.target: 藉由處理<xref:System.Windows.UIElement3D.OnMouseDown%2A>，您會隱含的類別處理負責執行下的所有可能的滑鼠按鈕。

trans-unit.source: This behavior might be unwanted.
trans-unit.target: 此行為可能會不必要的。

trans-unit.source: Therefore, use caution when you use this virtual method to mark events as handled.
trans-unit.target: 當您使用此虛擬方法標記為已處理的事件，因此，使用警告。

trans-unit.source: Each of the button-specific direct events also has a virtual On* method; consider whether overriding these button-specific class handlers might be more appropriate.
trans-unit.target: 每個按鈕特定直接事件也有虛擬機器 * 方法。請考慮是否覆寫這些按鈕特定的類別處理常式可能更合適。

trans-unit.source: This method has no default implementation.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會具有預設的實作。

trans-unit.source: Because an intermediate class in the inheritance might implement this method, we recommend that you call the base implementation in your implementation.
trans-unit.target: 因為中繼類別繼承中的可能會實作這個方法，我們建議您在自己的實作呼叫基底實作。

trans-unit.source: The purpose of this method is similar to the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_clr](~/includes/tlasharptla-clr-md.md)] event pattern On* methods: this method provides the means to handle the matching event from derived classes by establishing a class handler instead of an instance handler.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法的目的是類似於[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_clr](~/includes/tlasharptla-clr-md.md)]事件模式 * 方法： 這個方法會提供要藉由建立類別處理常式，而不是執行個體處理常式處理衍生類別的比對事件的方法。

trans-unit.source: In this case the matching event is a routed event.
trans-unit.target: 在此情況下，符合的事件是路由的事件。

trans-unit.source: The implementation pattern of the On* methods is different for routed events because a routed event can be raised by a child element, which is not necessarily the element that will invoke handlers.
trans-unit.target: 由於路由的事件就會引發子元素，不一定會叫用處理常式的項目，On * 方法的實作模式是不同的路由事件。

trans-unit.source: Therefore, your implementation needs to examine the source properties of the event data.
trans-unit.target: 因此，您的實作必須檢查的事件資料來源屬性。

trans-unit.source: It should not try to reraise the event in most cases.
trans-unit.target: 它不應嘗試重新引發此事件在大部分情況下。

trans-unit.source: Either by overriding this method or by registering class handlers with <xref:System.Windows.EventManager.RegisterClassHandler%2A>, derived classes of <xref:System.Windows.UIElement3D> can call private class handler methods when the event is received along the event route.
trans-unit.target: 覆寫這個方法，或登錄類別處理常式取代<xref:System.Windows.EventManager.RegisterClassHandler%2A>，衍生的類別<xref:System.Windows.UIElement3D>事件路由上收到事件時，可以呼叫私用類別處理常式方法。

trans-unit.source: One scenario where class handling is appropriate is to manipulate the event data and mark the routed event as handled.
trans-unit.target: 其中類別處理是適當的其中一個案例是操作事件資料，並標示為已處理的路由的事件。

trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.UIElement3D.OnMouseDown%2A> .NET Framework 3.5 版中引進。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Versions and Dependencies](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[版本和相依性](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md)。

trans-unit.target: 當這個項目上引發未處理的 <see cref="E:System.Windows.Input.Mouse.MouseEnter" /> 附加事件時叫用。

trans-unit.target: 因為中繼類別繼承中的可能會實作這個方法，我們建議您在自己的實作呼叫基底實作。

trans-unit.source: You may call base either before or after your special handling, depending on your requirements.
trans-unit.target: 您可能會呼叫基底之前或之後特殊處理，根據您的需求。

trans-unit.source: The purpose of this method is similar to the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_clr](~/includes/tlasharptla-clr-md.md)] event pattern On* methods: this method provides the means to handle the matching event from derived classes by establishing a class handler instead of an instance handler.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法的目的是類似於[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_clr](~/includes/tlasharptla-clr-md.md)]事件模式 * 方法： 這個方法會提供要藉由建立類別處理常式，而不是執行個體處理常式處理衍生類別的比對事件的方法。

trans-unit.source: In this case the matching event is a routed event, with a direct routing strategy.
trans-unit.target: 在此情況下，符合的事件是具有直接路由策略的路由的事件。

trans-unit.source: Marking the event as handled is still useful for preventing the typical instance handlers (those that do not specify `handledEventsToo`) from being invoked.
trans-unit.target: 將事件標示為已處理仍很有用防止一般的執行個體的處理常式 (這些不指定`handledEventsToo`) 叫用。

trans-unit.target: 這個方法的目的是類似於[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_clr](~/includes/tlasharptla-clr-md.md)]事件模式 * 方法： 這個方法會提供要藉由建立類別處理常式，而不是執行個體處理常式處理衍生類別的比對事件的方法。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.MouseButtonEventArgs" /> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: 包含事件資料的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.MouseButtonEventArgs" />。

trans-unit.source: The event data reports that the left mouse button was pressed.
trans-unit.target: 事件資料會報告滑鼠左鍵已按下。

trans-unit.source: Invoked when an unhandled <see cref="E:System.Windows.UIElement3D.MouseLeftButtonDown" /> routed event is raised on this element.
trans-unit.target: 當這個項目上引發未處理的 <see cref="E:System.Windows.UIElement3D.MouseLeftButtonDown" /> 路由事件時叫用。

trans-unit.source: Implement this method to add class handling for this event.
trans-unit.target: 實作這個方法可為此事件加入類別處理。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.UIElement3D.MouseLeftButtonDown> event appears to travel a bubbling route but actually travels in an indirect way.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.UIElement3D.MouseLeftButtonDown>事件反昇路由會出現但實際上是以間接方式。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Input.Mouse.MouseDown?displayProperty=nameWithType> is the underlying event that is bubble routed, and each <xref:System.Windows.UIElement3D> along the event route uses identical handling to raise the direct routed event <xref:System.Windows.UIElement3D.MouseLeftButtonDown>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Input.Mouse.MouseDown?displayProperty=nameWithType> 為路由傳送，泡泡圖的基礎事件和每個<xref:System.Windows.UIElement3D>沿著事件路由會使用相同的處理來直接路由的事件的引發<xref:System.Windows.UIElement3D.MouseLeftButtonDown>。

trans-unit.source: Although you can mark the <xref:System.Windows.UIElement3D.MouseLeftButtonDown> event as handled for purposes of this element, the handled state does not perpetuate to other elements along the event route.
trans-unit.target: 雖然您可以將標記<xref:System.Windows.UIElement3D.MouseLeftButtonDown>為基於的這個項目已處理的事件，處理的狀態不保存事件路由上的其他項目。

trans-unit.source: However, you might want to mark the event as handled in order to prevent general instance handlers (those that did not specify `handledEventsToo`) from being invoked.
trans-unit.target: 不過，您可能想要將事件標記為已處理，以避免一般的執行個體處理常式 (即未指定`handledEventsToo`) 叫用。

trans-unit.source: The default implementation for general mouse event handling in <xref:System.Windows.UIElement3D> listens for <xref:System.Windows.Input.Mouse.MouseDown?displayProperty=nameWithType> and converts it to an appropriate local event.
trans-unit.target: 一般的滑鼠事件處理中的預設實作<xref:System.Windows.UIElement3D>接聽<xref:System.Windows.Input.Mouse.MouseDown?displayProperty=nameWithType>並將它轉換成適當的本機事件。

trans-unit.source: If you want to override this logic, you must create a derived class.
trans-unit.target: 如果您想要覆寫這個邏輯，您必須建立衍生的類別。

trans-unit.source: In the static constructor of your derived class, register an alternative class handler for <xref:System.Windows.Input.Mouse.MouseDown?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: 在衍生類別的靜態建構函式中註冊替代的類別處理常式<xref:System.Windows.Input.Mouse.MouseDown?displayProperty=nameWithType>。

trans-unit.source: You cannot change the mouse handling behavior of <xref:System.Windows.UIElement3D> by overriding <xref:System.Windows.UIElement3D.OnMouseLeftButtonDown%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 您無法變更處理行為的滑鼠<xref:System.Windows.UIElement3D>藉由覆寫<xref:System.Windows.UIElement3D.OnMouseLeftButtonDown%2A>。

trans-unit.source: Alternatively, you can override this method in order to change event handling for a specific mouse state.
trans-unit.target: 或者，您可以覆寫這個方法以變更處理特定的滑鼠狀態的事件。

trans-unit.source: Whether you choose to call the base implementation depends on your scenario.
trans-unit.target: 您是否願意呼叫基底實作，取決於您的案例。

trans-unit.source: Failing to call base disables default input handling for that mouse event on ancestor classes that also expect to invoke <xref:System.Windows.UIElement3D.OnMouseLeftButtonDown%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 無法呼叫基底會停用該也預期會叫用的上階類別上的滑鼠事件的預設輸入的處理<xref:System.Windows.UIElement3D.OnMouseLeftButtonDown%2A>。

trans-unit.source: For example, you can derive from <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Button> and override <xref:System.Windows.UIElement3D.OnMouseLeftButtonDown%2A> in your derived class without calling the base implementation; however, this override disables the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ButtonBase.Click> event.
trans-unit.target: 例如，您可以從衍生<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Button>並覆寫<xref:System.Windows.UIElement3D.OnMouseLeftButtonDown%2A>在您衍生的類別，而不需要呼叫基底實作; 不過，這會覆寫停用<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ButtonBase.Click>事件。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.UIElement3D.OnMouseLeftButtonDown%2A> is introduced in the .NET Framework version 3.5.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.UIElement3D.OnMouseLeftButtonDown%2A> .NET Framework 3.5 版中引進。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Versions and Dependencies](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[版本和相依性](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md)。

trans-unit.source: The event data reports that the left mouse button was released.
trans-unit.target: 事件資料會報告已放開滑鼠左鍵。

trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.UIElement3D.MouseLeftButtonUp>事件反昇路由會出現但實際上是以間接方式。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Input.Mouse.MouseUp?displayProperty=nameWithType> is the underlying event that is bubble routed, and each <xref:System.Windows.UIElement3D> along the event route uses identical handling to raise the direct routed event <xref:System.Windows.UIElement3D.MouseLeftButtonUp>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Input.Mouse.MouseUp?displayProperty=nameWithType> 為路由傳送，泡泡圖的基礎事件和每個<xref:System.Windows.UIElement3D>沿著事件路由會使用相同的處理來直接路由的事件的引發<xref:System.Windows.UIElement3D.MouseLeftButtonUp>。

trans-unit.source: Although you can mark the <xref:System.Windows.UIElement3D.MouseLeftButtonUp> event as handled for purposes of this element, the handled state does not perpetuate to other elements along the event route.
trans-unit.target: 雖然您可以將標記<xref:System.Windows.UIElement3D.MouseLeftButtonUp>為基於的這個項目已處理的事件，處理的狀態不保存事件路由上的其他項目。

trans-unit.source: However, you might want to mark the event as handled in order to prevent general instance handlers (those that did not specify `handledEventsToo`) from being invoked.
trans-unit.target: 不過，您可能想要將事件標記為已處理，以避免一般的執行個體處理常式 (即未指定`handledEventsToo`) 叫用。

trans-unit.source: The default implementation for general mouse event handling in <xref:System.Windows.UIElement3D> listens for <xref:System.Windows.Input.Mouse.MouseUp?displayProperty=nameWithType> and converts it to an appropriate local event.
trans-unit.target: 一般的滑鼠事件處理中的預設實作<xref:System.Windows.UIElement3D>接聽<xref:System.Windows.Input.Mouse.MouseUp?displayProperty=nameWithType>並將它轉換成適當的本機事件。

trans-unit.source: If you want to override this logic, you must create a derived class.
trans-unit.target: 如果您想要覆寫這個邏輯，您必須建立衍生的類別。

trans-unit.source: In the static constructor of your derived class, register an alternative class handler for <xref:System.Windows.Input.Mouse.MouseUp?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: 在衍生類別的靜態建構函式中註冊替代的類別處理常式<xref:System.Windows.Input.Mouse.MouseUp?displayProperty=nameWithType>。

trans-unit.source: You cannot change the mouse handling behavior of <xref:System.Windows.UIElement3D> by overriding <xref:System.Windows.UIElement3D.OnMouseLeftButtonUp%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 您無法變更處理行為的滑鼠<xref:System.Windows.UIElement3D>藉由覆寫<xref:System.Windows.UIElement3D.OnMouseLeftButtonUp%2A>。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.UIElement3D.OnMouseLeftButtonUp%2A> is introduced in the .NET Framework version 3.5.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.UIElement3D.OnMouseLeftButtonUp%2A> .NET Framework 3.5 版中引進。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Versions and Dependencies](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[版本和相依性](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md)。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.MouseEventArgs" /> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: 包含事件資料的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.MouseEventArgs" />。

trans-unit.source: Invoked when an unhandled <see cref="E:System.Windows.Input.Mouse.MouseMove" /> attached event reaches an element in its route that is derived from this class.
trans-unit.target: 當未處理的 <see cref="E:System.Windows.Input.Mouse.MouseMove" /> 附加事件到達其路由中衍生自此類別的項目時叫用。

trans-unit.source: Implement this method to add class handling for this event.
trans-unit.target: 實作這個方法可為此事件加入類別處理。

trans-unit.source: This method has no default implementation.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會具有預設的實作。

trans-unit.source: Because an intermediate class in the inheritance might implement this method, we recommend that you call the base implementation in your implementation.
trans-unit.target: 因為中繼類別繼承中的可能會實作這個方法，我們建議您在自己的實作呼叫基底實作。

trans-unit.source: The purpose of this method is similar to the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_clr](~/includes/tlasharptla-clr-md.md)] event pattern On* methods: this method provides the means to handle the matching event from derived classes by establishing a class handler instead of an instance handler.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法的目的是類似於[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_clr](~/includes/tlasharptla-clr-md.md)]事件模式 * 方法： 這個方法會提供要藉由建立類別處理常式，而不是執行個體處理常式處理衍生類別的比對事件的方法。

trans-unit.source: In this case the matching event is a routed event.
trans-unit.target: 在此情況下，符合的事件是路由的事件。

trans-unit.source: The implementation pattern of the On* methods is different for routed events because a routed event can be raised by a child element, which is not necessarily the element that will invoke handlers.
trans-unit.target: 由於路由的事件就會引發子元素，不一定會叫用處理常式的項目，On * 方法的實作模式是不同的路由事件。

trans-unit.source: Therefore, your implementation needs to examine the source properties of the event data.
trans-unit.target: 因此，您的實作必須檢查的事件資料來源屬性。

trans-unit.source: It should not try to reraise the event in most cases.
trans-unit.target: 它不應嘗試重新引發此事件在大部分情況下。

trans-unit.source: Either by overriding this method or by registering class handlers with <xref:System.Windows.EventManager.RegisterClassHandler%2A>, derived classes of <xref:System.Windows.UIElement3D> can call private class handler methods when the event is received along the event route.
trans-unit.target: 覆寫這個方法，或登錄類別處理常式取代<xref:System.Windows.EventManager.RegisterClassHandler%2A>，衍生的類別<xref:System.Windows.UIElement3D>事件路由上收到事件時，可以呼叫私用類別處理常式方法。

trans-unit.source: One scenario where class handling is appropriate is to manipulate the event data and mark the routed event as handled.
trans-unit.target: 其中類別處理是適當的其中一個案例是操作事件資料，並標示為已處理的路由的事件。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.UIElement3D.OnMouseMove%2A> is introduced in the .NET Framework version 3.5.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.UIElement3D.OnMouseMove%2A> .NET Framework 3.5 版中引進。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Versions and Dependencies](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[版本和相依性](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md)。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.MouseButtonEventArgs" /> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: 包含事件資料的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.MouseButtonEventArgs" />。

trans-unit.source: The event data reports that the right mouse button was pressed.
trans-unit.target: 事件資料會報告滑鼠右鍵已按下。

trans-unit.source: Invoked when an unhandled <see cref="E:System.Windows.UIElement3D.MouseRightButtonDown" /> routed event reaches an element in its route that is derived from this class.
trans-unit.target: 當未處理的 <see cref="E:System.Windows.UIElement3D.MouseRightButtonDown" /> 路由事件到達其路由中衍生自此類別的項目時叫用。

trans-unit.source: Implement this method to add class handling for this event.
trans-unit.target: 實作這個方法可為此事件加入類別處理。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.UIElement3D.MouseRightButtonDown> event appears to travel a bubbling route but actually travels in an indirect way.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.UIElement3D.MouseRightButtonDown>事件反昇路由會出現但實際上是以間接方式。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Input.Mouse.MouseDown?displayProperty=nameWithType> is the underlying event that is bubble routed, and each <xref:System.Windows.UIElement3D> along the event route uses identical handling to raise the direct routed event <xref:System.Windows.UIElement3D.MouseRightButtonDown>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Input.Mouse.MouseDown?displayProperty=nameWithType> 為路由傳送，泡泡圖的基礎事件和每個<xref:System.Windows.UIElement3D>沿著事件路由會使用相同的處理來直接路由的事件的引發<xref:System.Windows.UIElement3D.MouseRightButtonDown>。

trans-unit.source: Although you can mark the <xref:System.Windows.UIElement3D.MouseRightButtonDown> event as handled for purposes of this element, the handled state does not perpetuate to other elements along the event route.
trans-unit.target: 雖然您可以將標記<xref:System.Windows.UIElement3D.MouseRightButtonDown>為基於的這個項目已處理的事件，處理的狀態不保存事件路由上的其他項目。

trans-unit.source: However, you might want to mark the event as handled in order to prevent general instance handlers (those that did not specify `handledEventsToo`) from being invoked.
trans-unit.target: 不過，您可能想要將事件標記為已處理，以避免一般的執行個體處理常式 (即未指定`handledEventsToo`) 叫用。

trans-unit.source: The default implementation for general mouse event handling in <xref:System.Windows.UIElement3D> listens for <xref:System.Windows.Input.Mouse.MouseDown?displayProperty=nameWithType> and converts it to an appropriate local event.
trans-unit.target: 一般的滑鼠事件處理中的預設實作<xref:System.Windows.UIElement3D>接聽<xref:System.Windows.Input.Mouse.MouseDown?displayProperty=nameWithType>並將它轉換成適當的本機事件。

trans-unit.source: If you want to override this logic, you must create a derived class.
trans-unit.target: 如果您想要覆寫這個邏輯，您必須建立衍生的類別。

trans-unit.source: In the static constructor of your derived class, register an alternative class handler for <xref:System.Windows.Input.Mouse.MouseDown?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: 在衍生類別的靜態建構函式中註冊替代的類別處理常式<xref:System.Windows.Input.Mouse.MouseDown?displayProperty=nameWithType>。

trans-unit.source: You cannot change the mouse handling behavior of <xref:System.Windows.UIElement3D> by overriding <xref:System.Windows.UIElement3D.OnMouseRightButtonDown%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 您無法變更處理行為的滑鼠<xref:System.Windows.UIElement3D>藉由覆寫<xref:System.Windows.UIElement3D.OnMouseRightButtonDown%2A>。

trans-unit.source: Alternatively, you can override this method in order to change event handling for a specific mouse state.
trans-unit.target: 或者，您可以覆寫這個方法以變更處理特定的滑鼠狀態的事件。

trans-unit.source: Whether you choose to call the base implementation depends on your scenario.
trans-unit.target: 您是否願意呼叫基底實作，取決於您的案例。

trans-unit.source: Failing to call base disables default input handling for that mouse event on ancestor classes that also expect to invoke <xref:System.Windows.UIElement3D.OnMouseRightButtonDown%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 無法呼叫基底會停用該也預期會叫用的上階類別上的滑鼠事件的預設輸入的處理<xref:System.Windows.UIElement3D.OnMouseRightButtonDown%2A>。

trans-unit.source: For example, you can derive from <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Control> and override <xref:System.Windows.UIElement3D.OnMouseRightButtonDown%2A> in your derived class without calling base; however, this override disables the context menu services on your control, which are part of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Control> default behavior.
trans-unit.target: 例如，您可以從衍生<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Control>並覆寫<xref:System.Windows.UIElement3D.OnMouseRightButtonDown%2A>中您的衍生類別，而不呼叫基底; 不過，此覆寫停用內容功能表上的服務您的控制項，也就是組件的<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Control>預設行為。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.UIElement3D.OnMouseRightButtonDown%2A> is introduced in the .NET Framework version 3.5.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.UIElement3D.OnMouseRightButtonDown%2A> .NET Framework 3.5 版中引進。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Versions and Dependencies](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[版本和相依性](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md)。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.MouseButtonEventArgs" /> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: 包含事件資料的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.MouseButtonEventArgs" />。

trans-unit.source: The event data reports that the right mouse button was released.
trans-unit.target: 事件資料會報告已放開滑鼠右鍵。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.MouseButtonEventArgs" /> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: 包含事件資料的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.MouseButtonEventArgs" />。

trans-unit.source: The event data reports that the mouse button was released.
trans-unit.target: 事件資料會報告滑鼠按鈕已釋放。

trans-unit.source: Invoked when an unhandled <see cref="E:System.Windows.Input.Mouse.MouseUp" /> routed event reaches an element in its route that is derived from this class.
trans-unit.target: 當未處理的 <see cref="E:System.Windows.Input.Mouse.MouseUp" /> 路由事件到達其路由中衍生自此類別的項目時叫用。

trans-unit.source: Implement this method to add class handling for this event.
trans-unit.target: 實作這個方法可為此事件加入類別處理。

trans-unit.source: Mouse button actions are also handled by a dedicated input manager.
trans-unit.target: 滑鼠按鈕動作也是由專用的輸入管理員處理。

trans-unit.source: Other programming features that rely on mouse button actions, such as input and command bindings, might invoke handlers for the action before it is exposed as a general mouse button action.
trans-unit.target: 依賴滑鼠按鈕的動作，例如輸入和命令繫結之前它會公開為一般的滑鼠按鈕動作, 可能會叫用動作的處理常式的其他程式設計功能。

trans-unit.source: If these input system features mark the <xref:System.Windows.Input.Mouse.MouseUp?displayProperty=nameWithType> event as handled, <xref:System.Windows.UIElement3D.OnMouseUp%2A> is not invoked.
trans-unit.target: 如果這些輸入系統功能標記<xref:System.Windows.Input.Mouse.MouseUp?displayProperty=nameWithType>事件為已處理，<xref:System.Windows.UIElement3D.OnMouseUp%2A>不會叫用。

trans-unit.source: If you use this class handler to mark the event as handled, you potentially impact the following events: <xref:System.Windows.UIElement3D.MouseLeftButtonUp> and <xref:System.Windows.UIElement3D.MouseRightButtonUp>.
trans-unit.target: 如果您使用這個類別處理常式來標示為已處理的事件時，可能會影響下列事件：<xref:System.Windows.UIElement3D.MouseLeftButtonUp>和<xref:System.Windows.UIElement3D.MouseRightButtonUp>。

trans-unit.source: Either of these events might be raised on the receiving element when <xref:System.Windows.Input.Mouse.MouseUp?displayProperty=nameWithType> is received.
trans-unit.target: 其中一個這些事件可能會接收項目上引發時<xref:System.Windows.Input.Mouse.MouseUp?displayProperty=nameWithType>收到。

trans-unit.source: If you mark this event as handled in class handling, subevents are still raised; however, they pass the handled state in the event data.
trans-unit.target: 如果您要標示為已處理的類別中處理此事件，仍然會引發子;不過，它們將傳遞事件資料中處理的狀態。

trans-unit.source: If the event is handled in class handling, instance handlers for the subevents are not invoked unless you explicitly use <xref:System.Windows.UIElement3D.AddHandler%28System.Windows.RoutedEvent%2CSystem.Delegate%2CSystem.Boolean%29> with `handledEventsToo` `true` in order to attach handlers.
trans-unit.target: 如果在處理中的類別處理事件，副的執行個體處理常式不會叫用除非您明確地使用<xref:System.Windows.UIElement3D.AddHandler%28System.Windows.RoutedEvent%2CSystem.Delegate%2CSystem.Boolean%29>與`handledEventsToo``true`才能附加處理常式。

trans-unit.source: Class handlers also are not invoked unless those class handlers were registered with the <xref:System.Windows.EventManager.RegisterClassHandler%28System.Type%2CSystem.Windows.RoutedEvent%2CSystem.Delegate%2CSystem.Boolean%29> signature with `handledEventsToo` `true`.
trans-unit.target: 類別處理常式也不會叫用這些類別處理常式已向除非<xref:System.Windows.EventManager.RegisterClassHandler%28System.Type%2CSystem.Windows.RoutedEvent%2CSystem.Delegate%2CSystem.Boolean%29>簽章與`handledEventsToo` `true`。

trans-unit.source: By handling <xref:System.Windows.UIElement3D.OnMouseUp%2A>, you are implying that your class handling accounted for all possible mouse button up actions.
trans-unit.target: 藉由處理<xref:System.Windows.UIElement3D.OnMouseUp%2A>，您會隱含的類別處理計算在內的所有可能滑鼠動作。

trans-unit.source: This behavior might be unwanted.
trans-unit.target: 此行為可能會不必要的。

trans-unit.source: Therefore, use caution when you use this virtual method to mark events as handled.
trans-unit.target: 當您使用此虛擬方法標記為已處理的事件，因此，使用警告。

trans-unit.source: Each of the button-specific direct events also has a virtual On* method; consider whether overriding these button-specific class handlers might be more appropriate.
trans-unit.target: 每個按鈕特定直接事件也有虛擬機器 * 方法。請考慮是否覆寫這些按鈕特定的類別處理常式可能更合適。

trans-unit.source: This method has no default implementation.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會具有預設的實作。

trans-unit.target: 因為中繼類別繼承中的可能會實作這個方法，我們建議您在自己的實作呼叫基底實作。

trans-unit.target: 這個方法的目的是類似於[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_clr](~/includes/tlasharptla-clr-md.md)]事件模式 * 方法： 這個方法會提供要藉由建立類別處理常式，而不是執行個體處理常式處理衍生類別的比對事件的方法。

trans-unit.source: In this case the matching event is a routed event.
trans-unit.target: 在此情況下，符合的事件是路由的事件。

trans-unit.source: The implementation pattern of the On* methods is different for routed events because a routed event can be raised by a child element, which is not necessarily the element that will invoke handlers.
trans-unit.target: 由於路由的事件就會引發子元素，不一定會叫用處理常式的項目，On * 方法的實作模式是不同的路由事件。

trans-unit.source: Therefore, your implementation needs to examine the source properties of the event data.
trans-unit.target: 因此，您的實作必須檢查的事件資料來源屬性。

trans-unit.source: It should not try to reraise the event in most cases.
trans-unit.target: 它不應嘗試重新引發此事件在大部分情況下。

trans-unit.source: Either by overriding this method or by registering class handlers with <xref:System.Windows.EventManager.RegisterClassHandler%2A>, derived classes of <xref:System.Windows.UIElement3D> can call private class handler methods when the event is received along the event route.
trans-unit.target: 覆寫這個方法，或登錄類別處理常式取代<xref:System.Windows.EventManager.RegisterClassHandler%2A>，衍生的類別<xref:System.Windows.UIElement3D>事件路由上收到事件時，可以呼叫私用類別處理常式方法。

trans-unit.source: One scenario where class handling is appropriate is to manipulate the event data and mark the routed event as handled.
trans-unit.target: 其中類別處理是適當的其中一個案例是操作事件資料，並標示為已處理的路由的事件。

trans-unit.source: Invoked when an unhandled <see cref="E:System.Windows.Input.Mouse.MouseWheel" /> attached event reaches an element in its route that is derived from this class.
trans-unit.target: 當未處理的 <see cref="E:System.Windows.Input.Mouse.MouseWheel" /> 附加事件到達其路由中衍生自此類別的項目時叫用。

trans-unit.source: Implement this method to add class handling for this event.
trans-unit.target: 實作這個方法可為此事件加入類別處理。

trans-unit.source: This method has no default implementation.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會具有預設的實作。

trans-unit.source: Because an intermediate class in the inheritance might implement this method, we recommend that you call the base implementation in your implementation.
trans-unit.target: 因為中繼類別繼承中的可能會實作這個方法，我們建議您在自己的實作呼叫基底實作。

trans-unit.source: The purpose of this method is similar to the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_clr](~/includes/tlasharptla-clr-md.md)] event pattern On* methods: this method provides the means to handle the matching event from derived classes by establishing a class handler instead of an instance handler.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法的目的是類似於[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_clr](~/includes/tlasharptla-clr-md.md)]事件模式 * 方法： 這個方法會提供要藉由建立類別處理常式，而不是執行個體處理常式處理衍生類別的比對事件的方法。

trans-unit.source: In this case the matching event is a routed event.
trans-unit.target: 在此情況下，符合的事件是路由的事件。

trans-unit.source: The implementation pattern of the On* methods is different for routed events because a routed event can be raised by a child element, which is not necessarily the element that will invoke handlers.
trans-unit.target: 由於路由的事件就會引發子元素，不一定會叫用處理常式的項目，On * 方法的實作模式是不同的路由事件。

trans-unit.source: Therefore, your implementation needs to examine the source properties of the event data.
trans-unit.target: 因此，您的實作必須檢查的事件資料來源屬性。

trans-unit.source: It should not try to reraise the event in most cases.
trans-unit.target: 它不應嘗試重新引發此事件在大部分情況下。

trans-unit.source: Either by overriding this method or by registering class handlers with <xref:System.Windows.EventManager.RegisterClassHandler%2A>, derived classes of <xref:System.Windows.UIElement3D> can call private class handler methods when the event is received along the event route.
trans-unit.target: 覆寫這個方法，或登錄類別處理常式取代<xref:System.Windows.EventManager.RegisterClassHandler%2A>，衍生的類別<xref:System.Windows.UIElement3D>事件路由上收到事件時，可以呼叫私用類別處理常式方法。

trans-unit.source: One scenario where class handling is appropriate is to manipulate the event data and mark the routed event as handled.
trans-unit.target: 其中類別處理是適當的其中一個案例是操作事件資料，並標示為已處理的路由的事件。

trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.UIElement3D.OnMouseWheel%2A> .NET Framework 3.5 版中引進。

trans-unit.source: It should not try to reraise the event in most cases.
trans-unit.target: 它不應嘗試重新引發此事件在大部分情況下。

trans-unit.source: Either by overriding this method or by registering class handlers with <xref:System.Windows.EventManager.RegisterClassHandler%2A>, derived classes of <xref:System.Windows.UIElement3D> can call private class handler methods when the event is received along the event route.
trans-unit.target: 覆寫這個方法，或登錄類別處理常式取代<xref:System.Windows.EventManager.RegisterClassHandler%2A>，衍生的類別<xref:System.Windows.UIElement3D>事件路由上收到事件時，可以呼叫私用類別處理常式方法。

trans-unit.source: One scenario where class handling is appropriate is to manipulate the event data and mark the routed event as handled.
trans-unit.target: 其中類別處理是適當的其中一個案例是操作事件資料，並標示為已處理的路由的事件。

trans-unit.source: Another scenario that is specifically for Preview events is to mark them handled so that the matching bubbling class handlers are not invoked.
trans-unit.target: 是特別針對預覽事件的另一種情形是將它們加以處理，因此相符的反昇類別處理常式不會叫用標記。

trans-unit.source: The purpose of this method is similar to the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_clr](~/includes/tlasharptla-clr-md.md)] event pattern On* methods: this method provides the means to handle the matching event from derived classes by establishing a class handler instead of an instance handler.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法的目的是類似於[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_clr](~/includes/tlasharptla-clr-md.md)]事件模式 * 方法： 這個方法會提供要藉由建立類別處理常式，而不是執行個體處理常式處理衍生類別的比對事件的方法。

trans-unit.source: In this case the matching event is a routed event.
trans-unit.target: 在此情況下，符合的事件是路由的事件。

trans-unit.source: The implementation pattern of the On* methods is different for routed events because a routed event can be raised by a child element, which is not necessarily the element that will invoke handlers.
trans-unit.target: 由於路由的事件就會引發子元素，不一定會叫用處理常式的項目，On * 方法的實作模式是不同的路由事件。

trans-unit.source: Therefore, your implementation needs to examine the source properties of the event data.
trans-unit.target: 因此，您的實作必須檢查的事件資料來源屬性。

trans-unit.source: It should not try to reraise the event in most cases.
trans-unit.target: 它不應嘗試重新引發此事件在大部分情況下。

trans-unit.target: 覆寫這個方法，或登錄類別處理常式取代<xref:System.Windows.EventManager.RegisterClassHandler%2A>，衍生的類別<xref:System.Windows.UIElement3D>事件路由上收到事件時，可以呼叫私用類別處理常式方法。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.MouseButtonEventArgs" /> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: 包含事件資料的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.MouseButtonEventArgs" />。

trans-unit.source: The event data reports that one or more mouse buttons were pressed.
trans-unit.target: 事件資料會報告一個或多個滑鼠按鈕已按下。

trans-unit.source: Invoked when an unhandled <see cref="E:System.Windows.Input.Mouse.PreviewMouseDown" /> attached routed event reaches an element in its route that is derived from this class.
trans-unit.target: 當未處理的 <see cref="E:System.Windows.Input.Mouse.PreviewMouseDown" /> 附加路由事件到達其路由中衍生自此類別的項目時叫用。

trans-unit.source: Implement this method to add class handling for this event.
trans-unit.target: 實作這個方法可為此事件加入類別處理。

trans-unit.source: Mouse button actions are also handled by a dedicated input manager.
trans-unit.target: 滑鼠按鈕動作也是由專用的輸入管理員處理。

trans-unit.source: Other programming features that rely on mouse button actions, such as input and command bindings, might invoke handlers for the action before it is exposed as a general mouse button action.
trans-unit.target: 依賴滑鼠按鈕的動作，例如輸入和命令繫結之前它會公開為一般的滑鼠按鈕動作, 可能會叫用動作的處理常式的其他程式設計功能。

trans-unit.source: If these input system features mark the <xref:System.Windows.Input.Mouse.PreviewMouseDown?displayProperty=nameWithType> event as handled, <xref:System.Windows.UIElement3D.OnPreviewMouseDown%2A> is not invoked.
trans-unit.target: 如果這些輸入系統功能標記<xref:System.Windows.Input.Mouse.PreviewMouseDown?displayProperty=nameWithType>事件為已處理，<xref:System.Windows.UIElement3D.OnPreviewMouseDown%2A>不會叫用。

trans-unit.source: If you use this class handler to mark the event as handled, you potentially impact the following events: <xref:System.Windows.UIElement3D.PreviewMouseLeftButtonDown> and <xref:System.Windows.UIElement3D.PreviewMouseRightButtonDown>.
trans-unit.target: 如果您使用這個類別處理常式來標示為已處理的事件時，可能會影響下列事件：<xref:System.Windows.UIElement3D.PreviewMouseLeftButtonDown>和<xref:System.Windows.UIElement3D.PreviewMouseRightButtonDown>。

trans-unit.source: Either of these events may be raised on the receiving element when <xref:System.Windows.Input.Mouse.PreviewMouseDown?displayProperty=nameWithType> is received.
trans-unit.target: 其中一個這些事件可能會接收的項目上引發時<xref:System.Windows.Input.Mouse.PreviewMouseDown?displayProperty=nameWithType>收到。

trans-unit.source: If you mark this event as handled in class handling, subevents are still raised; however, they pass the handled state in the event data.
trans-unit.target: 如果您要標示為已處理的類別中處理此事件，仍然會引發子;不過，它們將傳遞事件資料中處理的狀態。

trans-unit.source: If the event is handled in class handling, instance handlers for the subevents are not invoked unless you explicitly use <xref:System.Windows.UIElement3D.AddHandler%28System.Windows.RoutedEvent%2CSystem.Delegate%2CSystem.Boolean%29> with `handledEventsToo` `true` in order to attach handlers.
trans-unit.target: 如果在處理中的類別處理事件，副的執行個體處理常式不會叫用除非您明確地使用<xref:System.Windows.UIElement3D.AddHandler%28System.Windows.RoutedEvent%2CSystem.Delegate%2CSystem.Boolean%29>與`handledEventsToo``true`才能附加處理常式。

trans-unit.source: Class handlers also are not invoked unless those class handlers were registered with the <xref:System.Windows.EventManager.RegisterClassHandler%28System.Type%2CSystem.Windows.RoutedEvent%2CSystem.Delegate%2CSystem.Boolean%29> signature with `handledEventsToo` `true`.
trans-unit.target: 類別處理常式也不會叫用這些類別處理常式已向除非<xref:System.Windows.EventManager.RegisterClassHandler%28System.Type%2CSystem.Windows.RoutedEvent%2CSystem.Delegate%2CSystem.Boolean%29>簽章與`handledEventsToo` `true`。

trans-unit.source: By handling <xref:System.Windows.UIElement3D.OnPreviewMouseDown%2A>, you are implying that your class handling accounted for all possible mouse button down actions.
trans-unit.target: 藉由處理<xref:System.Windows.UIElement3D.OnPreviewMouseDown%2A>，您會隱含的類別處理負責執行下的所有可能的滑鼠按鈕。

trans-unit.source: This behavior might be unwanted.
trans-unit.target: 此行為可能會不必要的。

trans-unit.source: Therefore, use caution when you use this virtual method to mark events as handled.
trans-unit.target: 當您使用此虛擬方法標記為已處理的事件，因此，使用警告。

trans-unit.source: Each of the button-specific direct events also has a virtual On* method; consider whether overriding these button-specific class handlers might be more appropriate.
trans-unit.target: 每個按鈕特定直接事件也有虛擬機器 * 方法。請考慮是否覆寫這些按鈕特定的類別處理常式可能更合適。

trans-unit.source: This method has no default implementation.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會具有預設的實作。

trans-unit.source: Because an intermediate class in the inheritance might implement this method, we recommend that you call the base implementation in your implementation.
trans-unit.target: 因為中繼類別繼承中的可能會實作這個方法，我們建議您在自己的實作呼叫基底實作。

trans-unit.source: The purpose of this method is similar to the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_clr](~/includes/tlasharptla-clr-md.md)] event pattern On* methods: this method provides the means to handle the matching event from derived classes by establishing a class handler instead of an instance handler.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法的目的是類似於[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_clr](~/includes/tlasharptla-clr-md.md)]事件模式 * 方法： 這個方法會提供要藉由建立類別處理常式，而不是執行個體處理常式處理衍生類別的比對事件的方法。

trans-unit.source: In this case the matching event is a routed event.
trans-unit.target: 在此情況下，符合的事件是路由的事件。

trans-unit.source: The implementation pattern of the On* methods is different for routed events because a routed event can be raised by a child element, which is not necessarily the element that will invoke handlers.
trans-unit.target: 由於路由的事件就會引發子元素，不一定會叫用處理常式的項目，On * 方法的實作模式是不同的路由事件。

trans-unit.source: Therefore, your implementation needs to examine the source properties of the event data.
trans-unit.target: 因此，您的實作必須檢查的事件資料來源屬性。

trans-unit.source: It should not try to reraise the event in most cases.
trans-unit.target: 它不應嘗試重新引發此事件在大部分情況下。

trans-unit.source: Either by overriding this method or by registering class handlers with <xref:System.Windows.EventManager.RegisterClassHandler%2A>, derived classes of <xref:System.Windows.UIElement3D> can call private class handler methods when the event is received along the event route.
trans-unit.target: 覆寫這個方法，或登錄類別處理常式取代<xref:System.Windows.EventManager.RegisterClassHandler%2A>，衍生的類別<xref:System.Windows.UIElement3D>事件路由上收到事件時，可以呼叫私用類別處理常式方法。

trans-unit.source: One scenario where class handling is appropriate is to manipulate the event data and mark the routed event as handled.
trans-unit.target: 其中類別處理是適當的其中一個案例是操作事件資料，並標示為已處理的路由的事件。

trans-unit.source: Another scenario that is specifically for Preview events is to mark them handled so that the matching bubbling class handlers are not invoked.
trans-unit.target: 是特別針對預覽事件的另一種情形是將它們加以處理，因此相符的反昇類別處理常式不會叫用標記。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.UIElement3D.OnPreviewMouseDown%2A> is introduced in the .NET Framework version 3.5.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.UIElement3D.OnPreviewMouseDown%2A> .NET Framework 3.5 版中引進。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Versions and Dependencies](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[版本和相依性](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md)。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.MouseButtonEventArgs" /> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: 包含事件資料的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.MouseButtonEventArgs" />。

trans-unit.source: The event data reports that the left mouse button was pressed.
trans-unit.target: 事件資料會報告滑鼠左鍵已按下。

trans-unit.source: Invoked when an unhandled <see cref="E:System.Windows.UIElement3D.PreviewMouseLeftButtonDown" /> routed event reaches an element in its route that is derived from this class.
trans-unit.target: 當未處理的 <see cref="E:System.Windows.UIElement3D.PreviewMouseLeftButtonDown" /> 路由事件到達其路由中衍生自此類別的項目時叫用。

trans-unit.source: Implement this method to add class handling for this event.
trans-unit.target: 實作這個方法可為此事件加入類別處理。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.UIElement3D.PreviewMouseLeftButtonDown> event appears to travel a tunneling route but actually travels in an indirect way.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.UIElement3D.PreviewMouseLeftButtonDown>事件傳輸通道的路由會出現但實際上是以間接方式。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Input.Mouse.PreviewMouseDown?displayProperty=nameWithType> is the underlying event that is tunnel routed, and each <xref:System.Windows.UIElement3D> along the event route uses identical handling to raise the direct routed event <xref:System.Windows.UIElement3D.PreviewMouseLeftButtonDown>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Input.Mouse.PreviewMouseDown?displayProperty=nameWithType> 為基礎的事件通道路由傳送，且每個<xref:System.Windows.UIElement3D>沿著事件路由會使用相同的處理來直接路由的事件的引發<xref:System.Windows.UIElement3D.PreviewMouseLeftButtonDown>。

trans-unit.source: Although you can mark the <xref:System.Windows.UIElement3D.PreviewMouseLeftButtonDown> event as handled for purposes of this element, the handled state does not perpetuate to other elements along the event route.
trans-unit.target: 雖然您可以將標記<xref:System.Windows.UIElement3D.PreviewMouseLeftButtonDown>為基於的這個項目已處理的事件，處理的狀態不保存事件路由上的其他項目。

trans-unit.source: However, you might want to mark the event as handled in order to prevent general instance handlers (those that did not specify `handledEventsToo`) from being invoked.
trans-unit.target: 不過，您可能想要將事件標記為已處理，以避免一般的執行個體處理常式 (即未指定`handledEventsToo`) 叫用。

trans-unit.source: The default implementation for general mouse event handling in <xref:System.Windows.UIElement3D> listens for <xref:System.Windows.Input.Mouse.PreviewMouseDown?displayProperty=nameWithType> and converts it to an appropriate local event.
trans-unit.target: 一般的滑鼠事件處理中的預設實作<xref:System.Windows.UIElement3D>接聽<xref:System.Windows.Input.Mouse.PreviewMouseDown?displayProperty=nameWithType>並將它轉換成適當的本機事件。

trans-unit.source: If you want to override this logic, you must create a derived class.
trans-unit.target: 如果您想要覆寫這個邏輯，您必須建立衍生的類別。

trans-unit.source: In the static constructor of your derived class, register an alternative class handler for <xref:System.Windows.Input.Mouse.PreviewMouseDown?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: 在衍生類別的靜態建構函式中註冊替代的類別處理常式<xref:System.Windows.Input.Mouse.PreviewMouseDown?displayProperty=nameWithType>。

trans-unit.source: You cannot change the mouse handling behavior of <xref:System.Windows.UIElement3D> by overriding <xref:System.Windows.UIElement3D.OnPreviewMouseLeftButtonDown%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 您無法變更處理行為的滑鼠<xref:System.Windows.UIElement3D>藉由覆寫<xref:System.Windows.UIElement3D.OnPreviewMouseLeftButtonDown%2A>。

trans-unit.source: Alternatively, you can override this method in order to change event handling for a specific mouse state.
trans-unit.target: 或者，您可以覆寫這個方法以變更處理特定的滑鼠狀態的事件。

trans-unit.source: Whether you choose to call the base implementation depends on your scenario.
trans-unit.target: 您是否願意呼叫基底實作，取決於您的案例。

trans-unit.source: Failing to call base disables default input handling for that mouse event on ancestor classes that also expect to invoke <xref:System.Windows.UIElement3D.OnPreviewMouseLeftButtonDown%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 無法呼叫基底會停用該也預期會叫用的上階類別上的滑鼠事件的預設輸入的處理<xref:System.Windows.UIElement3D.OnPreviewMouseLeftButtonDown%2A>。

trans-unit.source: For example, you can derive from <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Button> and override <xref:System.Windows.UIElement3D.OnPreviewMouseLeftButtonDown%2A> in your derived class without calling the base implementation; however, this override disables the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ButtonBase.Click> event.
trans-unit.target: 例如，您可以從衍生<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Button>並覆寫<xref:System.Windows.UIElement3D.OnPreviewMouseLeftButtonDown%2A>在您衍生的類別，而不需要呼叫基底實作; 不過，這會覆寫停用<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ButtonBase.Click>事件。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.UIElement3D.OnPreviewMouseLeftButtonDown%2A> is introduced in the .NET Framework version 3.5.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.UIElement3D.OnPreviewMouseLeftButtonDown%2A> .NET Framework 3.5 版中引進。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Versions and Dependencies](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[版本和相依性](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md)。

trans-unit.source: Invoked when an unhandled <see cref="E:System.Windows.UIElement3D.PreviewMouseRightButtonUp" /> routed event reaches an element in its route that is derived from this class.
trans-unit.target: 當未處理的 <see cref="E:System.Windows.UIElement3D.PreviewMouseRightButtonUp" /> 路由事件到達其路由中衍生自此類別的項目時叫用。

trans-unit.source: Implement this method to add class handling for this event.
trans-unit.target: 實作這個方法可為此事件加入類別處理。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.UIElement3D.PreviewMouseRightButtonUp> event appears to travel a tunneling route but actually travels in an indirect way.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.UIElement3D.PreviewMouseRightButtonUp>事件傳輸通道的路由會出現但實際上是以間接方式。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Input.Mouse.PreviewMouseUp?displayProperty=nameWithType> is the underlying event that is tunnel routed, and each <xref:System.Windows.UIElement3D> along the event route uses identical handling to raise the direct routed event <xref:System.Windows.UIElement3D.PreviewMouseRightButtonUp>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Input.Mouse.PreviewMouseUp?displayProperty=nameWithType> 為基礎的事件通道路由傳送，且每個<xref:System.Windows.UIElement3D>沿著事件路由會使用相同的處理來直接路由的事件的引發<xref:System.Windows.UIElement3D.PreviewMouseRightButtonUp>。

trans-unit.source: Although you can mark the <xref:System.Windows.UIElement3D.PreviewMouseRightButtonUp> event as handled for purposes of this element, the handled state does not perpetuate to other elements along the event route.
trans-unit.target: 雖然您可以將標記<xref:System.Windows.UIElement3D.PreviewMouseRightButtonUp>為基於的這個項目已處理的事件，處理的狀態不保存事件路由上的其他項目。

trans-unit.source: However, you might want to mark the event as handled in order to prevent general instance handlers (those that did not specify `handledEventsToo`) from being invoked.
trans-unit.target: 不過，您可能想要將事件標記為已處理，以避免一般的執行個體處理常式 (即未指定`handledEventsToo`) 叫用。

trans-unit.source: The default implementation for general mouse event handling in <xref:System.Windows.UIElement3D> listens for <xref:System.Windows.Input.Mouse.PreviewMouseUp?displayProperty=nameWithType> and converts it to an appropriate local event.
trans-unit.target: 一般的滑鼠事件處理中的預設實作<xref:System.Windows.UIElement3D>接聽<xref:System.Windows.Input.Mouse.PreviewMouseUp?displayProperty=nameWithType>並將它轉換成適當的本機事件。

trans-unit.source: If you want to override this logic, you must create a derived class.
trans-unit.target: 如果您想要覆寫這個邏輯，您必須建立衍生的類別。

trans-unit.source: In the static constructor of your derived class, register an alternative class handler for <xref:System.Windows.Input.Mouse.PreviewMouseUp?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: 在衍生類別的靜態建構函式中註冊替代的類別處理常式<xref:System.Windows.Input.Mouse.PreviewMouseUp?displayProperty=nameWithType>。

trans-unit.source: You cannot change the mouse handling behavior of <xref:System.Windows.UIElement3D> by overriding <xref:System.Windows.UIElement3D.OnPreviewMouseRightButtonUp%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 您無法變更處理行為的滑鼠<xref:System.Windows.UIElement3D>藉由覆寫<xref:System.Windows.UIElement3D.OnPreviewMouseRightButtonUp%2A>。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.UIElement3D.OnPreviewMouseRightButtonUp%2A> is introduced in the .NET Framework version 3.5.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.UIElement3D.OnPreviewMouseRightButtonUp%2A> .NET Framework 3.5 版中引進。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Versions and Dependencies](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[版本和相依性](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md)。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.MouseButtonEventArgs" /> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: 包含事件資料的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.MouseButtonEventArgs" />。

trans-unit.source: The event data reports that one or more mouse buttons were released.
trans-unit.target: 事件資料會報告一個或多個滑鼠按鈕已釋放。

trans-unit.source: Invoked when an unhandled <see cref="E:System.Windows.Input.Mouse.PreviewMouseUp" /> attached event reaches an element in its route that is derived from this class.
trans-unit.target: 當未處理的 <see cref="E:System.Windows.Input.Mouse.PreviewMouseUp" /> 附加事件到達其路由中衍生自此類別的項目時叫用。

trans-unit.source: Implement this method to add class handling for this event.
trans-unit.target: 實作這個方法可為此事件加入類別處理。

trans-unit.source: Mouse button actions are also handled by a dedicated input manager.
trans-unit.target: 滑鼠按鈕動作也是由專用的輸入管理員處理。

trans-unit.source: Other programming features that rely on mouse button actions, such as input and command bindings, might invoke handlers for the action before it is exposed as a general mouse button action.
trans-unit.target: 依賴滑鼠按鈕的動作，例如輸入和命令繫結之前它會公開為一般的滑鼠按鈕動作, 可能會叫用動作的處理常式的其他程式設計功能。

trans-unit.source: If these input system features mark the <xref:System.Windows.Input.Mouse.PreviewMouseUp?displayProperty=nameWithType> event as handled, <xref:System.Windows.UIElement3D.OnPreviewMouseUp%2A> is not invoked.
trans-unit.target: 如果這些輸入系統功能標記<xref:System.Windows.Input.Mouse.PreviewMouseUp?displayProperty=nameWithType>事件為已處理，<xref:System.Windows.UIElement3D.OnPreviewMouseUp%2A>不會叫用。

trans-unit.source: If you use this class handler to mark the event as handled, you potentially impact the following events: <xref:System.Windows.UIElement3D.PreviewMouseLeftButtonUp> and <xref:System.Windows.UIElement3D.PreviewMouseRightButtonUp>.
trans-unit.target: 如果您使用這個類別處理常式來標示為已處理的事件時，可能會影響下列事件：<xref:System.Windows.UIElement3D.PreviewMouseLeftButtonUp>和<xref:System.Windows.UIElement3D.PreviewMouseRightButtonUp>。

trans-unit.source: Either of these events might be raised on the receiving element when <xref:System.Windows.Input.Mouse.PreviewMouseUp?displayProperty=nameWithType> is received.
trans-unit.target: 其中一個這些事件可能會接收項目上引發時<xref:System.Windows.Input.Mouse.PreviewMouseUp?displayProperty=nameWithType>收到。

trans-unit.source: If you mark this event as handled in class handling, subevents are still raised; however, they pass the handled state in the event data.
trans-unit.target: 如果您要標示為已處理的類別中處理此事件，仍然會引發子;不過，它們將傳遞事件資料中處理的狀態。

trans-unit.source: If the event is handled in class handling, instance handlers for the subevents are not invoked unless you explicitly use <xref:System.Windows.UIElement3D.AddHandler%28System.Windows.RoutedEvent%2CSystem.Delegate%2CSystem.Boolean%29> with `handledEventsToo` `true` in order to attach handlers.
trans-unit.target: 如果在處理中的類別處理事件，副的執行個體處理常式不會叫用除非您明確地使用<xref:System.Windows.UIElement3D.AddHandler%28System.Windows.RoutedEvent%2CSystem.Delegate%2CSystem.Boolean%29>與`handledEventsToo``true`才能附加處理常式。

trans-unit.source: Class handlers also are not invoked unless those class handlers were registered with the <xref:System.Windows.EventManager.RegisterClassHandler%28System.Type%2CSystem.Windows.RoutedEvent%2CSystem.Delegate%2CSystem.Boolean%29> signature with `handledEventsToo` `true`.
trans-unit.target: 類別處理常式也不會叫用這些類別處理常式已向除非<xref:System.Windows.EventManager.RegisterClassHandler%28System.Type%2CSystem.Windows.RoutedEvent%2CSystem.Delegate%2CSystem.Boolean%29>簽章與`handledEventsToo` `true`。

trans-unit.source: By handling <xref:System.Windows.UIElement3D.OnPreviewMouseUp%2A>, you are implying that your class handling accounted for all possible mouse button up actions.
trans-unit.target: 藉由處理<xref:System.Windows.UIElement3D.OnPreviewMouseUp%2A>，您會隱含的類別處理計算在內的所有可能滑鼠動作。

trans-unit.source: This behavior might be unwanted.
trans-unit.target: 此行為可能會不必要的。

trans-unit.source: Therefore, use caution when you use this virtual method to mark events as handled.
trans-unit.target: 當您使用此虛擬方法標記為已處理的事件，因此，使用警告。

trans-unit.source: Each of the button-specific direct events also has a virtual On* method; consider whether overriding these button-specific class handlers might be more appropriate.
trans-unit.target: 每個按鈕特定直接事件也有虛擬機器 * 方法。請考慮是否覆寫這些按鈕特定的類別處理常式可能更合適。

trans-unit.source: This method has no default implementation.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會具有預設的實作。

trans-unit.source: Because an intermediate class in the inheritance might implement this method, we recommend that you call the base implementation in your implementation.
trans-unit.target: 因為中繼類別繼承中的可能會實作這個方法，我們建議您在自己的實作呼叫基底實作。

trans-unit.source: The purpose of this method is similar to the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_clr](~/includes/tlasharptla-clr-md.md)] event pattern On* methods: this method provides the means to handle the matching event from derived classes by establishing a class handler instead of an instance handler.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法的目的是類似於[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_clr](~/includes/tlasharptla-clr-md.md)]事件模式 * 方法： 這個方法會提供要藉由建立類別處理常式，而不是執行個體處理常式處理衍生類別的比對事件的方法。

trans-unit.source: In this case the matching event is a routed event.
trans-unit.target: 在此情況下，符合的事件是路由的事件。

trans-unit.source: The implementation pattern of the On* methods is different for routed events because a routed event can be raised by a child element, which is not necessarily the element that will invoke handlers.
trans-unit.target: 由於路由的事件就會引發子元素，不一定會叫用處理常式的項目，On * 方法的實作模式是不同的路由事件。

trans-unit.source: Therefore, your implementation needs to examine the source properties of the event data.
trans-unit.target: 因此，您的實作必須檢查的事件資料來源屬性。

trans-unit.source: It should not try to reraise the event in most cases.
trans-unit.target: 它不應嘗試重新引發此事件在大部分情況下。

trans-unit.source: Either by overriding this method or by registering class handlers with <xref:System.Windows.EventManager.RegisterClassHandler%2A>, derived classes of <xref:System.Windows.UIElement3D> can call private class handler methods when the event is received along the event route.
trans-unit.target: 覆寫這個方法，或登錄類別處理常式取代<xref:System.Windows.EventManager.RegisterClassHandler%2A>，衍生的類別<xref:System.Windows.UIElement3D>事件路由上收到事件時，可以呼叫私用類別處理常式方法。

trans-unit.source: One scenario where class handling is appropriate is to manipulate the event data and mark the routed event as handled.
trans-unit.target: 其中類別處理是適當的其中一個案例是操作事件資料，並標示為已處理的路由的事件。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.UIElement3D.OnPreviewMouseUp%2A> is introduced in the .NET Framework version 3.5.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.UIElement3D.OnPreviewMouseUp%2A> .NET Framework 3.5 版中引進。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Versions and Dependencies](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[版本和相依性](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md)。

trans-unit.target: 包含事件資料的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.MouseWheelEventArgs" />。

trans-unit.source: Therefore, your implementation needs to examine the source properties of the event data.
trans-unit.target: 因此，您的實作必須檢查的事件資料來源屬性。

trans-unit.source: It should not try to reraise the event in most cases.

trans-unit.source: Either by overriding this method or by registering class handlers with <xref:System.Windows.EventManager.RegisterClassHandler%2A>, derived classes of <xref:System.Windows.UIElement3D> can call private class handler methods when the event is received along the event route.
trans-unit.target: 覆寫這個方法，或登錄類別處理常式取代<xref:System.Windows.EventManager.RegisterClassHandler%2A>，衍生的類別<xref:System.Windows.UIElement3D>事件路由上收到事件時，可以呼叫私用類別處理常式方法。

trans-unit.source: One scenario where class handling is appropriate is to manipulate the event data and mark the routed event as handled.
trans-unit.target: 其中類別處理是適當的其中一個案例是操作事件資料，並標示為已處理的路由的事件。

trans-unit.source: Another scenario that is specifically for Preview events is to mark them handled so that the matching bubbling class handlers are not invoked.
trans-unit.target: 是特別針對預覽事件的另一種情形是將它們加以處理，因此相符的反昇類別處理常式不會叫用標記。

trans-unit.target: 是特別針對預覽事件的另一種情形是將它們加以處理，因此相符的反昇類別處理常式不會叫用標記。

trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.UIElement3D.OnPreviewStylusButtonDown%2A> .NET Framework 3.5 版中引進。

trans-unit.target: 包含事件資料的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.StylusButtonEventArgs" />。

trans-unit.source: Invoked when an unhandled <see cref="E:System.Windows.Input.Stylus.PreviewStylusButtonUp" /> attached event reaches an element in its route that is derived from this class.
trans-unit.target: 當未處理的 <see cref="E:System.Windows.Input.Stylus.PreviewStylusButtonUp" /> 附加事件到達其路由中衍生自此類別的項目時叫用。

trans-unit.source: Implement this method to add class handling for this event.
trans-unit.target: 實作這個方法可為此事件加入類別處理。

trans-unit.source: This method has no default implementation.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會具有預設的實作。

trans-unit.source: Because an intermediate class in the inheritance might implement this method, we recommend that you call the base implementation in your implementation.
trans-unit.target: 因為中繼類別繼承中的可能會實作這個方法，我們建議您在自己的實作呼叫基底實作。

trans-unit.source: The purpose of this method is similar to the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_clr](~/includes/tlasharptla-clr-md.md)] event pattern On* methods: this method provides the means to handle the matching event from derived classes by establishing a class handler instead of an instance handler.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法的目的是類似於[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_clr](~/includes/tlasharptla-clr-md.md)]事件模式 * 方法： 這個方法會提供要藉由建立類別處理常式，而不是執行個體處理常式處理衍生類別的比對事件的方法。

trans-unit.source: In this case the matching event is a routed event.
trans-unit.target: 在此情況下，符合的事件是路由的事件。

trans-unit.source: The implementation pattern of the On* methods is different for routed events because a routed event can be raised by a child element, which is not necessarily the element that will invoke handlers.
trans-unit.target: 由於路由的事件就會引發子元素，不一定會叫用處理常式的項目，On * 方法的實作模式是不同的路由事件。

trans-unit.source: Therefore, your implementation needs to examine the source properties of the event data.
trans-unit.target: 因此，您的實作必須檢查的事件資料來源屬性。

trans-unit.source: It should not try to reraise the event in most cases.
trans-unit.target: 它不應嘗試重新引發此事件在大部分情況下。

trans-unit.source: Either by overriding this method or by registering class handlers with <xref:System.Windows.EventManager.RegisterClassHandler%2A>, derived classes of <xref:System.Windows.UIElement3D> can call private class handler methods when the event is received along the event route.
trans-unit.target: 覆寫這個方法，或登錄類別處理常式取代<xref:System.Windows.EventManager.RegisterClassHandler%2A>，衍生的類別<xref:System.Windows.UIElement3D>事件路由上收到事件時，可以呼叫私用類別處理常式方法。

trans-unit.source: One scenario where class handling is appropriate is to manipulate the event data and mark the routed event as handled.
trans-unit.target: 其中類別處理是適當的其中一個案例是操作事件資料，並標示為已處理的路由的事件。

trans-unit.source: Another scenario that is specifically for Preview events is to mark them handled so that the matching bubbling class handlers are not invoked.
trans-unit.target: 是特別針對預覽事件的另一種情形是將它們加以處理，因此相符的反昇類別處理常式不會叫用標記。

trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.UIElement3D.OnPreviewStylusButtonUp%2A> .NET Framework 3.5 版中引進。

trans-unit.target: 因此，您的實作必須檢查的事件資料來源屬性。

trans-unit.source: It should not try to reraise the event in most cases.
trans-unit.target: 它不應嘗試重新引發此事件在大部分情況下。

trans-unit.source: Either by overriding this method or by registering class handlers with <xref:System.Windows.EventManager.RegisterClassHandler%2A>, derived classes of <xref:System.Windows.UIElement3D> can call private class handler methods when the event is received along the event route.
trans-unit.target: 覆寫這個方法，或登錄類別處理常式取代<xref:System.Windows.EventManager.RegisterClassHandler%2A>，衍生的類別<xref:System.Windows.UIElement3D>事件路由上收到事件時，可以呼叫私用類別處理常式方法。

trans-unit.source: One scenario where class handling is appropriate is to manipulate the event data and mark the routed event as handled.
trans-unit.target: 其中類別處理是適當的其中一個案例是操作事件資料，並標示為已處理的路由的事件。

trans-unit.source: Another scenario that is specifically for Preview events is to mark them handled so that the matching bubbling class handlers are not invoked.
trans-unit.target: 是特別針對預覽事件的另一種情形是將它們加以處理，因此相符的反昇類別處理常式不會叫用標記。

trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.UIElement3D.OnPreviewStylusOutOfRange%2A> .NET Framework 3.5 版中引進。

trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[版本和相依性](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md)。

trans-unit.source: Implement this method to add class handling for this event.

trans-unit.source: This method has no default implementation.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會具有預設的實作。

trans-unit.source: Because an intermediate class in the inheritance might implement this method, we recommend that you call the base implementation in your implementation.
trans-unit.target: 因為中繼類別繼承中的可能會實作這個方法，我們建議您在自己的實作呼叫基底實作。

trans-unit.source: The purpose of this method is similar to the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_clr](~/includes/tlasharptla-clr-md.md)] event pattern On* methods: this method provides the means to handle the matching event from derived classes by establishing a class handler instead of an instance handler.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法的目的是類似於[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_clr](~/includes/tlasharptla-clr-md.md)]事件模式 * 方法： 這個方法會提供要藉由建立類別處理常式，而不是執行個體處理常式處理衍生類別的比對事件的方法。

trans-unit.source: In this case the matching event is a routed event.
trans-unit.target: 在此情況下，符合的事件是路由的事件。

trans-unit.source: The implementation pattern of the On* methods is different for routed events because a routed event can be raised by a child element, which is not necessarily the element that will invoke handlers.
trans-unit.target: 由於路由的事件就會引發子元素，不一定會叫用處理常式的項目，On * 方法的實作模式是不同的路由事件。

trans-unit.source: Therefore, your implementation needs to examine the source properties of the event data.
trans-unit.target: 因此，您的實作必須檢查的事件資料來源屬性。

trans-unit.source: It should not try to reraise the event in most cases.
trans-unit.target: 它不應嘗試重新引發此事件在大部分情況下。

trans-unit.target: 覆寫這個方法，或登錄類別處理常式取代<xref:System.Windows.EventManager.RegisterClassHandler%2A>，衍生的類別<xref:System.Windows.UIElement3D>事件路由上收到事件時，可以呼叫私用類別處理常式方法。

trans-unit.target: 其中類別處理是適當的其中一個案例是操作事件資料，並標示為已處理的路由的事件。

trans-unit.source: Another scenario that is specifically for Preview events is to mark them handled so that the matching bubbling class handlers are not invoked.
